Summary: Great for my old, spoiled dog
Text: My elderly (soon-to-be 17) beagle, Dakota, is super picky about what he eats.  Making a different dish (has to have different protein source and flavoring) every other night is the only way I can keep weight on this once food-frenzied chow hound.  The ONLY consistent item he eats -- including dog treats and human table food -- are Greenies treats.  The "Senior" variety is the perfect texture (softer than the regular Greenies treats) for his aging, sensitive teeth.  The inclusion of glucosamine and chondroitin to help with his joints give me hope that it helps the creaking and cracking of his joints.  Whatever the formula they use to make it easier to digest is a plus since I know his aging system doesn't work as well in his older years.  Dakota gets one petite Greenies Senior treat everyday and he has never turned down an offer for one yet.

My dog loves her greenies, she gets one every morning, if I forget to give her one she lets me know it in no uncertain terms.
I buy them from Amazon because the price is right, petsmart wants to much for them.
I just ordered them yesterday, received them today.

Thanks
This product is just what we wanted. Doggie loves them,and I can hardly believe how fast they got here. Excellent seller.....Bunny

My dogs MUST HAVE a daily Greenie 1st thing in the morning. If I run out, there is hell to pay. If they wake before me, they start licking my face so bad that I have to wash it! I have 2 Maltese and they literally start dancing when I bring out the box. Last order I made a mistake and bought 6 boxes. So I should be set for a while.
27 ounce 96 count teenie tub pack

I DONT UNDERSTAND HOW YOU CAN SELL USED GREENIES. PLEASE EXPLAIN.

I also purchased a Kindle. I LOVE IT. I have optic neuritis from Multiple Sclerosis and I am now able to read by adjusting the font.
I am dissapointed that the letters are wearing off and the covers are so expensive. My cousin made me a beautiful one out of quilt. Much nicer than the $50+++ ones from Amazon. I TOLD HER SHE SHOULD SELL THEM.

My name is Duncan, and I'm a mommy's boy, and she and Dad love me so much that they give me one of these every day after supper.  They taste great and clean my teeth at the same time.  All my friends love them, too! They buy them from Amazon because the price is good.  I'm going to have them get on the automatic sending list, so I'll never run out!

The thing I like about the senior Greenies is that they seem a little bit softer than regular Greenies, so they are easier on my dogs' teeth (I have 6 dogs, 5 seniors and only my 9-toothed senior Doxie doesn't eat them).

These are great for small dogs. I have two dachshunds and I love that these are lower in calories. I cut them in half because they get more than one per day. They like them as much as the regular ones.

My dogs get more excited over Greenies than any other treat. I have one German Shorthair that is a notoriously finicky eater, and she has flat-out refused many varieties of dental bones. Not only do the Greenies do a great job of keeping her teeth clean, but she practically does back flips when it's time for her daily chew.

I have pointers between 45 and 60 pounds, and the regular size is great for them. Greenies are not a chew that will last very long (usually about 30 seconds with my dogs) - but they do the job. The chew's consistency is just right for a dental bone. I give one to each dog after their evening meal, and afterwards there is no food residue left on their teeth.

Dental bones aren't the kind of treats that I use frequently or for training. I give 1 per day to help with oral hygiene. Based on that use of this product I have yet to find anything that compete with Greenies.

I have two Chihuahua/Yorkie females (age 5, both 7 pounds) and they absolutely love these -- it helps their breath smell better too.  It's a win-win situation!  I give them each one a day.  Amazon's price of $22.95 for 96 beats the price at my local pet store by a full ten dollars!

Summary: Greenie is my dog's other name
Text: The fur kid loves these & vet has commented on how clean her teeth are for a seven year old.  They're pricey, but for a once a day treat I think they're worth it for keeping her teeth in good condition, not to mention seeing her big grin when we open the container.  We should've named her "Greenie" because that one word gets her attention like nothing else will.

Summary: Great product and free shipping to AK.  Can't beat that!
Text:
I thought I would write a review because I have seen some negative ones out there. In particular, ones about dogs vomitting green sponges after eating them.

My girlfriend and I have a little maltese (Dexter). He's a little over two years old and loves greenies. Absolutely loves them. They're his favorite treat. He loves to hide them and then go back for them later.

A couple things to watch for... the package says to only feed them one a day. We were feeding him like 3 or 4 a day. We thought it was like a dental treat and couldn't hurt. We've cut it back to one a day and every once and awhile we'll give him two.

Another thing, they can be messy. When we first got him and he was tiny, it would take him awhile to eat them. Once they get wet, they tend to stick to things. Now that he's older, he eats them pretty fast so there's no problem.

We've never had him vomit from them, ever. Even when we were giving him 4 a day. He loves them and has never gotten ill from them. One time, he got into the package when we weren't paying attention and hid them all over the house so he probably has a secret stash somewhere.

I would stick to the product recommendations (if you can) and if your dog is like ours, he'll love them.

After having 11 teeth pulled by the Vet, I had to find a convenient way to brush my dogs teeth.  I have used these for 6 months and he has not had any more teeth problems.  he loves the taste and he has fresh breath.

I have a little Shi-Tzu...Every day at 3:oopm she gets a greenie.She never forget,She stare at me with her lazer eyes until I go to the package and give one greenie. She loves your product and cannot live without it.
My dog loves the Greenies and they actually do work for him as his teeth are whiter and breath is fresher.  I have tried other brands and had to come back to the Greenies!

Oh my gosh, we cannot be without Greenies at our house or I will have a very unhappy doggie. I am a huge fan of Amazon, they treat their customers right and makes all purchases/returns very easy.
Same thing you buy for a lot more at other stores. Not much more to say about.  I love it, she loves it, and I've bought it again numerous times.

Coconut Oil is so tasty, it goes great with anything sweet. I use it on a piece of bread with honey, so good. It is also good for Asian style sweet dishes, gives an excellent flavor. If you using it as a dietary supplement by taking a tablespoon; it can be quite difficulty to swallow because of the texture. One thing about this oil is it doesn't refrigerate well and at 76 Fahrenheit it melts completely.

This was my first time to try coconut oil, other than using the red kind for popcorn. [which works great in a Stir Crazy] I will be repeating what many have said, but just to add my thoughts....I hope Amazon stocks this FOREVER !! Smells lovely, like coconut, reminds me of the beach. At room temperature, it is solid....and if I have one tiny complaint, it can be a little difficult to spoon out of the jar. I don't want to soften/melt it each time I need a teaspoonful, so I struggle a bit and scoop it out.

On toast or English muffins, you can use it just like butter, but it seems to have a much more pleasant taste, and leaves the bread more crispy, {never soggy like butter can sometimes pool on toast in little patches.} To use making scrambled eggs or an omelet, it's easy to use, just like any oil, and adds no real discernible taste to me. It's great to just take some and rub on your skin, you then smell wonderful, and it soaks right in....leaving your skin smooth and silky. I have dry skin, and using this coconut oil or almond oil is something that has changed my life....tossing out all the "off the shelf" lotions that never really helped.

Only time will tell if all the health benefits pan out for me. But I enjoy using this instead of butter, and plan to continue to do so. The price is great here on Amazon, especially on Subscribe and Save. It was delivered quickly, although it was just tossed into a large box, and allowed to roll around in transit, which I thought was strange packaging. But it was undamaged, and still solid, no evidence of leakage in the box.

I highly recommend this to anyone wanting to try healthier oils, and anyone with dry skin. I read online that this can be mixed with garlic oil and Vit. E liquid to make a healing ointment. There is a lot of info online regarding the positives of coconut oil, and Dr. Oz recommends it, for what that is worth to you.

This product is simply amazing. It is a much better value on Amazon than anywhere else I have seen. I recently went to an over-priced "Parisian" hair salon to get a keratin treatment and it left my long, natural hair severely damaged, breaking, and feeling like straw. Yes, I am still miffed. My sister insisted that I ditch all the expensive treatments and commercial products and just let my hair go natural and treat it with coconut oil which she uses on her gorgeous, long, black tresses. In desperation, I ordered several bottles. They came surprisingly fast and I immediately tore open the box and after inhaling the euphoric aroma for a half a minute, I slathered it on my hair and scalp and left it on all day (while indoors). After I washed it off, my hair was visibly silkier, shinier, and had much less breakage. I'm in love! Also, I use it on my skin and it absorbs well and leaves my skin supple with a slight smell of coconut. Love the price, love the product. Can't go wrong.

I am a biracial man.Now,that means i have Indian,African,Caucasus in me.Now i have really dry hair with many split ends and hair loss.This coconut oil has bring my hair back to normal as it should has been.I rub apple cider vinger on my scalp before i was my hair.I rub the coconut oil through my hair also.Put coconut oil in a cup and let it warm by a heater so i will feel like hot oil.Do not heat your oil up on a stove or in a microwave.Let the oil and vinger set in your hair for an hour than wash it out.Shampoo i used Henna shampoo and psoriasis shampoo from Justnatural.com.If you are African and you want to stop using them chemical perms or straightener combs i recommend you start using this.This will and i guarantee straighten your hair out and give it the real nutrients that your hair needs.Try it and you will not turn back!The best oil on the market!

I have tried a few different extra virgin coconut oil products in the past (Vitamin shoppe brand, parachute,etc) and they tend to have a grainy texture to them. Not a major problem, but who wants to pick shredded coconut out of their hair? This brand was so silky, smooth, and smelled wonderful. I think I found my favorite brand of EVCO!

I love this stuff.  I use it on my skin and it drinks it up.  I put it in my hair before washing, and my hair looks great and hydrated.  I really like this stuff.  I moisturize my face with it at night as well.  It's really an amazing product.  Bravo and I'm so happy I bought this :)

I've bought both this brand and the Nutiva, and to be honest there's no real discernible difference. Both are good products. I do like the see through container this one has though a bit better since you can see exactly how much you have left a little easier. I use the oil for my GI tract since I have several issues with it and have difficulty with handling and absorbing fats. I try to eat at least a tblsp a day, usually spread on toast, it's excellent as a spread. I use it in baking in place of butter and other oils and sometimes for cooking too.

I love this product. The scent isn't overpowering. We have been using this for many things such as the treatment of diaper rash, hand moisturizer, and even in the bedroom. I love how it melts to the touch. Will definitely buy again.

Summary: What "Extra Virgin" label  mean for coconut ?????
Text:
If the label say "Cold Pressed" and "Organic", it would make more sense to me than saying "Extra Virgin" blah blah blah because this "Extra Virgin" theme is borrowed from the olive oil) and which does not make any sense for coconut. The "Extra Virgin" label is just for marketing purpose and to make the product itself more appealing to buyer.
I have no way to verify if this coconut oil is truly organic or cold pressed, since I wasn't in Philippine at the time they made it, but
I hope they are honest.

Anyway,
I like the taste of this oil, I mix it with peanut butter, and I wish if I can find a coconut oil with a stronger coconut taste. For me the coconut taste is not strong enough. I tried different brand from amazon, and all has the same taste. I tried the Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 29-Ounce Jars (Pack of 2) and has the same taste as this one, except this Nature's oil brand is sometime cheaper
I like it, and will keep doing so as long as they offer it at a competitive price.

I love this oil, it smells great and it tastes great.  I use this oil for EVERYTHING!!  I cook with it, I wash my face with it, I use it as an oil treatment in my hair, I put it all over my body and it has cured my eczema!  I really like this brand, I think it has the best flavor and the price is really good.

After years and years of suffering, long vet office visits, tons of money on vet bills, applying gallons of meds prescribed, my dogs still had itchy bleeding ear infections until Coconut Oil. I had recently heard of health benefits of coconut oil, in particular of anti bacterial aspect, I gave it a try.

After about 1 week, both of my dog's ear infections are almost completely gone!!! with NO bad side effects. I now feed them about a teaspoon of coconut oil for their overall health.

I've been using this coconut oil every chance I get. It does wonderful things for my hair, and skin (conditions, moisturizes it without any buildup). I'm in the process of transiting from my chemically treated hair and was informed that pure coconut oil is great for natural hair, and wow I am impressed. It's a very light oil, unlike olive oil, which is great, but thicker and heavier.  I haven't used it in my food yet.  Also there is not a coconut scent to it, and it does not really have a taste to it.
The Nature's Way coconut oil has done wonders for my hair. I leave it on for two hours before washing and it really does the job of moisturizing my hair.

I just love this stuff. I'm still trying it out, but so farit's great, very versitile. I use it in my hair, on my face, as a lotion and take 1 tbls everyday by mouth. i have yet to cook with it.  But so far so good.
I have tried numerous coconut oils, but this product is by far, the best for the price.

I LOVE THIS STUFF!! It smells like a macaroon
and is great for moisturizing and cooking. I made chicken with it and it was delicious.
I love this stuff. I use it to keep my skin soft and smooth. It smells incredible. It doesn't leave an icky residue on my skin like other skin softeners do. It has a wonderful, subtle flavor.

Edit Below
I got this on sale and am new to this. I have been reading about the uses and was ready to try it. The first thing I did was try it on my hair. I can't remember if I left a review on the other Coconut oil I bought but I have hair past my waist and I was in my pool on a hot day and when I finally got out I was exhausted. I wanted to rest before I showered and passed out. I went to sleep with all of that chlorine in my hair and my hair was a dull, brittle feeling. I had just received the oil 2 days before. So I rubbed it through my hair. My hair seemed to be bright and soft. It even looked a little more blond. I have been cutting up veggies and spraying the oil on them while cooking. I put 2 tbsp of EVOO and 3 tbsp of Coconut oil the grated the garlic and added my Parmesan cheese. OMG, it was so wonderful.
Thanks to all of you who inspired me to start using this stuff.

I decided to try this coconut oil after reading tons of blogs about all the different uses it has, and I'm really glad I did!

My daughter has a pretty bad case of Keratosis Pilaris on both of her arms, and also her cheeks. I've tried numerous products on her to try to remove the little bumps, but nothing had worked. Almost immediately after applying a very thin layer of coconut oil on her skin, there was an amazing improvement! The bumps lessened, and after a week they had completely disappeared! After seeing these results, I had my son use it, who has eczema on his hands.... and again, the eczema cleared up almost immediately.

I personally use the coconut oil on my hands to moisturize them, and also put a tablespoon of the stuff in my coffee every morning to help with my metabolism as I have thyroid issues.

I know my title is a bit much, but this oil is seriously multi-purposed and it's that great. I use this brand on my daughter's skin from around 5mths to now 11mths. She had severe Ezcema and it kept recuring whenever she got hot. her skin in exactly like a baby's skin should be - soft and smooth since I started using it. Plus I'm always smelling her bc she smells so yummy. OFF TOPIC: I also give her lots of pure coconut water and she loves it
For me, I spread it on my toast, sprinkle on my salads, saute with it - scrambled eggs are THE BEST when fried with this. I even put a few teaspoons in my hot choclate (yummy). It's the best for retaining moisture in your hair so I also use as a hot oil treatment before bed and wash off next day. I let my hair air dry and it's the softest its been in years. I lather with is right after my shower and wake up with soft supple skin. I keep one in the bathroom, another in the Kitchen and one in my daughter's room. I will NEVER be without this super product.
Oh and my mom swears by it too as it's helped control her blood sugar (she's a diabetic) Her Doc is so impressed he took her off Metformin.
I put just a dab of coconut oil on my feet and my feet became soft instantly. I love this product. so many different usages.

I've been natural for almost a year now and its hard to find a product that could really add moisture to my hair while killing my dandruff problem. I was hesitate at first after seeing a friend use it on his hair (He's Spanish so it works with different hair types)I thought his hair took well to the product because of the completely different texture, but I tried it anyway.

I must say my hair absolutely loves this stuff. It not only moisturizer my hair but it makes it really soft and manageable. It also gives my hair shine, body, and luster. Although, I have flakes here and there the amount of dandruff has decreased dramatically, when I use the product consistently.I have even given it a test run by allowing my hair to go without it for about a week. I only used regular conditioner on my hair. The results were terrible. My hair became dried and rough. It lost the luster and shine and it was no longer silky to the touch.

This product is amazing and I would recommend it to anyone with any hair type.

I use this soooo much, I have it on auto order!  I give a spoonful to my dog a day and it keeps his coat shiny, his breath fresh, and he LOVES IT!  For me I put it on my curly hair to tame the frizz, on my skin as a moisturizer, and I take 2tbs a day as a weight loss supplement...you can't go wrong with this product.  It tastes great and I don't even like coconut, amazing to scramble eggs with though!

Summary: Read this if you have keratosis piliarisis!!!
Text:
This gets rid of your KP! I have a bad case of KP ever since I was younger. It is so embarrassing and people always asked what was wrong with the skin on my upper arms.

I was willing to try anything because nothing, no cream, no scrub has gotten rid of it until I tried coconut oil. I wish I could tell the world about how this has been miracle for me.

Trust me just buy it :)

Unlike the medical establishment, I have come to believe that fats in general are NOT harmful OR fattening! There are so many different types if fat, they should not all be lumped together. Avoid the long chain saturated fats (animal fats), but short chain saturated fats (like butter, palm, and coconut) are fine.

I love cooking my morning eggs in this oil. They stick WAY less than cooked in butter or olive oil. Yes, it imparts a VERY MILD coconut taste to whatever you cook in it. I don't mind, and have come to like it. It was different the first few times, tho. I also recommend you get an aluminum anodized (ceramic non-stick) pan. Yes, I know they still contain teflon...doesn't bother me (the anodize coating is porous, and the pores are filled with teflon). The anodized aluminum is so much more durable you will love it!

Satisfied customer...great product...great price...I'll be buying regularly!

I put this on my feet at night, my face as a moisturizer and put a little in my protein shakes. Excellent product and see the benefits already after a couple of weeks using it. Haven't cooked with it yet but judging by the smell of it, I will try in the near future.
This is the first coconut oil I've used and so far I love it. It moisturizes my 40-something skin very well! It also leaves my lips so soft! Will definitely purchase this product again.

i'm so glad I figured out the secret of coconut oil. My fav way to use it is for lotion. After I shave my legs and I put this stuff on it helps my legs stay so smooth and soft. My hair does not grow back so prickly. I also love how when I go into the ocean after I shave my legs it does not burn anymore! I also use this for baking food. My food comes out more moist, especially cakes. There are so many good health reasons to use coconut oil. For skin and for eating. wow I love multi tasking:)

Summary: Awesome conditioner for thick African American hair!
Text:
This coconut oil works wonders for my hair! I'm transitioning from using over the counter products with more natural alternatives and I truly am pleased. After about a month of using it as an overnight prepoo and after wash sealer I have noticed a change for the better in my hair. Coconut oil is the only oil that can penetrate into your hair follicles. My hair holds moisture a lot better than ever before, is stronger, shinier, smoother and softer. It makes a great hot oil treatment in tandem with amla oil. The smell isn't strong - it has a light nutty coco butter scent.

Also, I found using this with shea butter liquifies it easier when rubbing your palms together. I've only used this product on my hair but I would love to try it with cooking.

Ive been getting different brands of coconut oil for a few years, more recently the big tub from Jarrow. I cook with it almost every day and take spoon fulls of it as well..I decided to try this brand based on the trusty reviews here on amazon and I am amazed..This stuff is simply delicious. Im surprised how different it is from Jarrow..It definitely has that more natural taste that the reviews here said. I will never get another brand of coconut oil.

Summary: Excellent for skin, hair, and cooking
Text: I bought this primarily to use on my hair after using coconut oil in small bottles that I would have to microwave before use because they were solid. This oil is easy to scoop out and it melts in your hands so doesn't need to be continually microwaved. I ran out of anti-wrinkle cream, so I decided to put this oil of my face instead, and it makes it very soft and supple and hopefully it will keep the wrinkles at bay as well. On a whim, I decided to use some while frying rice and it came out absolutely delicious. It gives a hint of coconut flavor to dishes cooked in it. I'm ordering another jar because I don't want to cook with something I'm scooping out to use on my face and hair.  I will be ordering many more jars.

Very good quality unrefined coconut oil.  I coom with this and used it to mix with shea butter when i was pregnant for preventing stretch marks and itching and it worked great.  I use it for my baby's ezema now too, its greasy on the skin but soaks in quickly.  When cooking I use it in place of butter and olive oil and it has actually helped with my weight loss and my husbands, of course you have to eat healthy too but it made a noticeable difference in a two week period of time.

Summary: One of the Best Coconut oils on the Market
Text:
We enjoyed our first 2 jars and use it for cooking an average of 2 times a day. Storage ok so far with our
house temp under 76 degrees. During the summer will have to refrigerate it to keep it solid. Great flavor with all meats-beef, fish, chicken; adding to oatmeal. Too bad the prices are going up everywhere including this product on all Coconut oils sold. This is the best price for this brand so far. Will continue to use it unless the price keeps going up.

Summary: Pure and tasty CoconutOil from Amazon
Text: Mild but definite Coconut flavor here. I use instead of butter on toast, vegies, rice, cakes, etc. Not good for frying, except eggs. No crispy browning. Contains medium chain amino acids that works wonders on brain neuron connections for Alshiemers and weaned  babies. Lack of these, may even be a factor in causing Autism. Olive, and other oils have none. Non-hydrogenated!

I use this coconut oil as both a skin oil and a deep conditioner for my hair. It gives me a lovely coconut fragrance, and my skin and hair haven't been this soft in years! I am also going to go out and get a small container so I can carry a bit around in my purse for chapstick. No more dry lips for me! I highly recommend this product to anyone (Well, unless you hate coconut. Then you might not be such a fan of the smell. It is pretty subtle, however, and reminds me of summer :D ).

Summary: The smell of sunshine and ice-cream!
Text: I thought I hated coconut oil, because I bought the cheap, processed Louanna coconut oil from Wally World. It is still sitting in the cupboard with only one use. Later, I read an article and found that to get the benefits of coconut oil you need it unrefined. When I opened the lid the smell of coconut assured me that this oil was the real thing--I love this stuff! I've used it so many different ways; my favourite ways to use are as a sugar scrub or as a deodorant--melt a few tablespoons of oil, put in 1/8 cup baking soda and cornstarch, and a couple drops of tea tree oil.

I recently read that coconut oil can be helpful with dementia so I looked for an easy source (as a hopeful preventative!).  This is a very nice product and gives good instructions for using it for cooking and also as a hair treatment.  I certainly recommend it.  And they have a web address on the jar for answering questions.  I contacted them with a question about allergens and they responded quickly.

Summary: Tastes great and good for you
Text: Coconut oil is so good for you and tasty. It contains 62% MCT (medium chain triglycerides) which is a type of fat that actually helps you burn MORE fat. Easy to cook with and make delicious smoothies with too.

I LOVE the organic coconut oil by Nature's Way.  It is the best moisturizer for my face and hair (I have tried almond, shea and grapeseed too), and not to mention, it feels so smooth, creamy and totally awesome on my hands, fingertips and feet.  Also, this is totally natural and cold pressed.  What more can you ask for?  No bad odors either (unlike shea oil)!  I have used the Nutiva organic coconut oil too, and Nature Way just feels a lot better and totally awesome on my hands.  I cannot comment as far as cooking is concerned, because I go through these jars very fast just using them for hair and skincare and scalp message.  I use this and pure almond oil alternatively on my eyelids and under eyes.  Try it by all means, if you are thinking about it.

I'm just starting out with coconut oil, and after trying this product,well, I'm a now believer.  I wasn't sure what I'd gotten myself into when I first tried a spoonful.  The texture reminded me a bit of crisco (uh!), but it immediately started to warm on my tongue and there was a heavenly, light coconut aftertaste that reminded me a bit of an almond joy bar (without the almond or chocolate).  I prefer not to eat it by the spoonful because of the consistency, but really like spreading it on a graham cracker, the taste of which reminds me of coconut cream pie with a graham cracker crust. I also like cooking with it, and didn't notice coconut-tasting chicken. I recently ordered a larger amount of coconut oil and tried a different brand, but I prefer the Nature's Way flavor. I'll use the other brand as a moisturizing cream, and order more of the Nature's Way for eating and cooking. It's wonderful for moisturizing after a shower, or for using right before bed when the coconut scent is restful. This is my favorite brand, and I'm sticking to it.

I use this coconut oil on my hair as a sealant after I moisturize my hair, and I also mix it into my conditioners and oils. I absolutely adore this product! My hair smells absolutely amazing and feels just as good! I recommend buying this, because the results are nothing short of amazing! My hair has never been so soft and smelt so good before!

I was surprised how large the tub actually was. The coconut oil is in a crisco consistency, but when I bake something with it, I just smear it on the pan, and when I fry something with it, I just drop it in the pan like I would butter. It smells incredible! After cooking with it, I could smell it on me for a few hours after and loved it. I use lots of it when I make coconut chicken, shrimp, etc. I use it to sautee my vegetables too. The coconut taste is not overwhelming, so substituting this healthy option for your regular cooking oil will not "ruin" your dishes or significantly change the taste of your food. I will purchase again.

My sister introduced me to coconut oil and although she was weary about me using it as face lotion I showed her that it helped me A LOT with my dry skin and did not cause acne. Normally I have really dry skin on my nose at forehead to the extent that it would start peeling off in the middle of the day... and no lotions would work! :( Coconut oil is the only thing that keeps my skin fairly normal in this regard -- especially with the dry, harsh winters of IL. Any coconut oil would do, but this one is low cost, high quality, has fast shipping. Basically, once this jar runs out, I'm ordering it again.

Summary: I just got mine and I am so excited!
Text: It smelled great in the jar. I used it immediately on my pregnant belly, thighs, eyes, and a dry patch under my mouth. I also heated up a tiny bit (a little goes a long way) in the microwave to apply to my hair and ends to freshen up my 3rd day flexi rod set. I can just tell this is my new beauty staple! My cat tried to eat some too and that just goes to show because my smart fat kitty would never try to eat any hair product, but he knew this baby was naturally edible lol.

This coconut oil has truly been my little miracle product. I have Keratosis Pilaris and I have tried different products for years trying to get rid of it or improve it even a little, to no avail. I have tried countless lotions, including KP Duty. About a month ago I stumbled upon an article of someone claiming coconut oil cleared up her keratosis, I was skeptical but figured it was worth a shot. I have been applying coconut oil to my skin every time I take a shower and also mixing in about 1/2 a tablespoon with my dinner for about a month now.  I also added a daily multivitamin into my diet. The progress was slow but now all of a sudden my skin has shown incredible improvement. I would say my keratosis has cleared up as much as 75%!  I am shocked and very happy.  Such a cheap alternative to all the expensive lotions too!! I will continue to use Coconut Oil for life.

I bought this as a suggestion for my very dry and very sensitive skin. I absolutely love it. I used it for the first time and my skin is already 80% better!  It doesn't leave you overly oily either. It smells so yummy as well. Very happy overall!

Coconut oil. My staple product for hair ,supplements, body lotion. This stuff has my hair growing like wild fire. It works great smell awesome and its the best body oil. My number one thing is coconut oil. Try it.
This stuff is so great. It smells wonderful and melts like butter in your hands. I love its many different uses. I love it on my hair and skin and soon ill try some of it in my food.

This is a very unique oil, you can use it in your hair as a hot oil treatment, use it to soothe pain on an infected area on the skin, you can use it when cooking. I like the solid form of this product. No spills, melt what you need. Nice fragrance too.
I use it on my skin, but it is eatable.  It melts right away when you spread it on your skin and it smells sooo good.
I received this item within a week and I am stationed overseas. I use it on my skin and it makes it soooo soft.

You can a little of this with just about anything you bake.  I add this to my baked banana bread and it's great.  I've used it on my hair also, I remember using pure coconut oil when I was a little girl in my home country as a conditioner and hair softener.  This is a good price as I've seen it for a lot more in our local stores.

I am from the Philippines, so I am familiar with the smell of fresh coconut oil. I have tried various so-called virgin coconut oils before, but they smelled so rancid within one week of opening, that at one point I resorted to rendering my own coconut oil, but that was so time-consuming and tedious. Some other brands were masked by additional scent. For a while I was discouraged from trying any coconut oil, until I read reviews on this one. I tried one, and I was hooked. It smelled so HEAVENLY like the fresh coconut that I remember. Every time I would apply on my skin or hair, I would be reminded of our rice-based coconut desserts, so for purposes of having a dose of 1-2 tbsp per day, it was also not hard for me to take it plain, although the lack of sweetness quickly brings me back to the reality that it was not coconut-y dessert I was eating, but that's easily solved by adding muscovado or brown sugar. This is certainly the best coconut oil I have had so far, and the ONLY one I have tried and actually finished (I used to stop using those previous ones when I could no longer stomach the rancid smell, which usually brought the content down to only 25%).  This is also the first coconut oil brand that I actually tried to bake with (although it quickly used up my tub). I have subscribed for this to be delivered monthly, but I might change that to a more frequent supply of fresh tubs. After I was truly impressed by it, only then did I check out where it came from, and was surprised to find that it came from my country! Keep up the good work of making available a quality product to the whole world!

Summary: Tastes Good And Is Not Expensive
Text:
I don't know if this is making me healthier or not but I have added into my shake on recommendation from my grandmother. It tastes like coconut! I only take a teaspoon a day so I can warm up to it. After about 3 weeks I should be taking a tablespoon or 2. The price is right on this oil.

Shake: Amazing Meal Pomegranate-Mango Superfood Powder, frozen strawberries, frozen cranberries, frozen raspberries, half a banana, almond milk, Greek yogurt, Big Train Strawberry Smoothie Mix and Nature's Way coconut oil. This is a thick, thick shake that will fill you up for hours.

Update 10/08/12: I have found by far the most efficient and delicious way to get my daily 1 tablespoon. Take 1 tablespoon of coconut oil and heat until it's clear and oily in a dish. Mix in 1 heaping tablespoon of peanut butter. Stir until the peanut butter is evenly mixed into the oil. Eat on whatever. I have found that if I put large amounts on each bite, it is good sized or a bagel. The coconut oil mellows out the flavor and stick-to-the-roof-of-your-mouth quality of the peanut butter, so I can eat much more on a bite than if it was just peanut butter. Delicious protein and good fats.

Gonna make this short and sweet. I use it to *shallow* fry lot's of food. I take it also just as it is when I am feeling lazy and don't feel like eating. After a 4 day juice fast, I started a vegetarian diet, with next to no meat (I currently don't eat meat or eggs, or any dairy products), HIGH plant fats, probably a couple pounds of fruits and veggies every day, and lots of coconut milk. Oh, and lets not forget beans and rice, unprocessed kinds of course. Despite my high fat diet, I am dropping fat weekly. While there may or may not be a profound effect with this oil, I can safely say that it hasn't added any fat. In fact, I am pretty certain that it aids in fat metabolisation. Plus, you get a rare type of MCT with this product, which makes up nearly 70% of the fat contained in the oil.

On a side note... DON'T BE AFRAID OF PLANT FATS!! You want to lose weight? Stop eating processed foods (ALL TYPES), eat beans and bulk rice (Wild, Forbidden, Long Grain Brown, Red Rice etc..), nuts/seeds, nutbutter and coconut! Oh, and veggies too of course. Its easy AND CHEAP to eat well. It took me quite some time to be able to figure out how to eat so well on a less than stellar budget, but it can be done! <3

Summary: Good for you in every way
Text: Wow, I'm learning more about natural health products and the how good they are for you.  This Coconut oil is amazing, a gift from God to us.  I used this coconut oil mix with a little baking soda to make homemade deodorant and it works unlike the ones I bought from the natural store.  I use this coconut oil to moisturize my skin, treat my hair, and to nourish my inside by taking a teaspoon a day.  This is heaven sent, and it helps to kill candida and a whole lot of other stuff! Simply put, its just good for you.  This particular brand is better than others I've compared it to.  It has more of the good fat and it tastes better.  5 thumbs up for EfaGold, and the price on amazon is fabulous too!

so I'm a college student who has been trying to learn how to live a much healthier life in the mist of crazy assignments and packed schedules. I bought this back in January originally for my hair since I'm an African American woman with 3c/4a natural hair. and while it has done WONDERS growing my hair, I've been even more amazed by its other talents. If you use it as an occasional moisturizer it will leave you skin sooooooo soft. I also use it now as a substtute of oil/butter when I'm using my frying pan. You can hardly taste it, and when you do it doesn't taste bad at all. And it works better than oil and butter in my opinion. I'm not a chef but it seems to still burn a little bit when you use oil or butter. With this coconut oil, i just pour a dime size in the pan and use a paper towel to distribute it evenly so it give it a nice gloss. I let it heat for just a few seconds, add my food, and then wa la! no burning, and no more unnecessary calories. I will credit it (along with my diet and exercise) for allowing me to lose 30 pounds this summer. WOOH!

I absolutely love this product! And I highly recommend it for women of color, who is looking for that perfect hair conditioner that moisturizes, gives a beautiful shine to your hair, and has a nice fragrance.  It is the all-purpose daily moisturizer for your skin as well. I had been looking for oil that would keep my coils hydrated and I found this coconut oil through Amazon. You will not be disappointed.

Summary: Coconut Oil is Good for You
Text: After reading a book "What if there was a cure for Alzheimers" and finding out the importance of medium chain triglycerides in diet, I began doing a little research on my own and found this product.  It is not only good for you, it has a wonderful flavor in low temp cooking(from eggs to oatmeal), used as a spread, in morning smoothies(adds a crunch as well because it hardens when cooled) and in baking!  Amazon has the best price consistently and Natures  is the best product.  I have it on my auto ship program and love it!

This stuff is wonderful.  You can use it as a lotion after bathing, put in your hair, roll it around in your mouth to collect bacteria (spit it out after 2 minutes) cook with it, shine your shoes with it but the very best is it makes your face feel wonderful all day.  It is by far the best night/day cream and it absorbs quickly so there is no greasy feel.  Love it!!!

I purchased this to use in place of chemical-filled skin lotions. I had developed some allergic reactions to some items in man-made lotions and my naturopath recommended using organic coconut oil instead. I LOVE this oil. It has a light coconut smell that does not linger too long. I use this all over including on my face and my skin has been more moist (no longer do my legs get dry looking), my face less oily and with fewer blemishes. My husband has noted that my skin looks younger and fresher. It DOES take a while to soak in so I have had to adjust my routine a bit to avoid getting oil on things but have yet to stain any clothing or other items. I tried a couple brands I found at the store prior to ordering this after reading the reviews and have found the brand I will remain loyal to in Nature's Way Effagold.

I have also used this in cooking and love the light coconut taste it adds to food. I still use EVOO for certain things as the taste just compliments certain foods better, but this oil has definitely been added to the diet and is in the rotation.

i ordered this after reading alot of positive reviews.i like it so much i have it on autoship every month.i'm thinking of having it come every 2 weeks.i put it in almost everything i eat.what i have leftover i put on my hands.i feel like it is helping.i think more clearly and i think it helps my joints.in fact i ate it both on my breakfast and in my lunch today.it has a subtle coconut flavor that tastes good on almost anything.
This product is truly amazing.  I use it every day on my arms to help add moisture to my dry skin.  It has helped smooth the lines and dry skin without the oily feeling of most moisturizers.

Great aroma and wonderful flavor.  Coming from the land of coconuts, I found this to be a superior product similar to what we get there - a high quality.  Some refined oils have a heady aroma which gets "cooked" out.  This one retains its aroma even after cooking. I have used it for sauteing, pan-frying and seasoning with no flavor loss.  Tastes even delicious when raw.  Bit on the expensive side but I'm ready to pay that extra penny for great flavor.

High quality, great price, convenient size, I keep it handy in the kitchen to add to whatever I cook. Use it in place of/ with regular cooking oil.. Nature's Way Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 16 Ounce

Summary: Delicious and healthy - Organic EV Coconut Oil
Text:
I'm a recent convert to the overwhelming benefits of coconut oil. I previously used the Spectrum Naturals brand from a local grocery chain, but gave this one a try because it was a little less expensive. This coconut oil is far better in my opinion. It smells great in the jar, and smells AMAZING when cooking. I've used it for almost every meal I've needed oil for since getting it: browning meat, making crepes, even homemade marinades. When cooking a recipe with many ingredients the flavor tends to get lost, but for less complex meals (like lime shrimp I sauteed last week) you could taste a hint of coconut in the meal. What a fantastic addition! So far everyone, even our kids, has had nothing but rave reviews about it.

It's summer and very warm here, so when we got our first jar it was completely liquid. It was a surprise to me, because every jar I'd bought at the store was always like a thick white paste. No worries; if that bothers you, just put in the fridge and it'll harden right up.

We have at least three brands of coconut oil at my house, and this has been the best quality yet! great for cooking, and tastes good. you can tell the quality is higher when all three brands heat up. Natures Way is the only brand you can easily see through, very pure. I liked it and I'm back for more!

I used to straighten my hair A LOT and have decided to wear it more naturally. Therefore I find when I mix this coconut oil with some olive oil and aloe vera, I get soft, shiny hair. I really advise that you all do the same, but make sure not to put too much in otherwise you will be a grease head. But this coconut oil is truly amazing.

Summary: This is the Best cooking oil!
Text: I've been using this coconut oil for several months now, and I love it! Tastes delicious. I even eat it by the spoonful. Sits on my kitchen counter, and never goes rancid. Solid but melts at 72 degrees, so it's easy to use whenever I need oil to cook with. Plus Coconut oil is very good for you. My cholesterol is under control, my veins and arteries are clear. My weight is normal. All these things have happened since I started using this oil. I highly recommend it.

Summary: Nature's Way EfaGold Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil
Text: I was so happy to receive my Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil. It arrived when it was estimated to arrive, it was packaged properly. My only concern at first was that the oil was in liquid format. But after reading the the information on the back of the jar, it did state that it will become solid at room temperature. So I will wait to see if it gets solid. I have ordered coconut oil in the past, but it did not smell like coconut. This product actually smells like coconut. I love the smell. I have opened the jar at least 5 times while writing this to take in the aroma. So excited to try my new coconut oil on my newly natural hair.

Mine arrived already liquified, probably because I live in Florida and it's the summer temps!  But, I used a small "turkey baster" I bought from the salon supply store for acetone to add some to my hair potion and it smelled awesome enough o eat!  Even though I bought it for cosmetic purposes, I just may have to try it for cooking! Anyway, I also added a bit that was lingering on the foil seal to my curly baby hairs around my face and they were instantly soft, shiny ringlets! There's is quite a good amount in this sized container to last a while too. A little goes a long way! I am impressed with this product and will be buying it regularly in the future!

Summary: YUM! All aboard the coconut train!!
Text: If you don't know how good this is for you.... If you don't know how great the quality of this brand.... well you're missing out. When you get to heaven's gate I assure you St. Peter will remind you of my words.

Just buy this brand! I have tried all the rest and this one is the best for cooking, using it on skin and hair. Coconut is so good for you. Its the magic cure for everything. It has the good fat in it. Buy a book on the mirical of coconut oil and sit back and be amazed at what it can do for you and change your life. Study up on other oils for cooking and be prepared to be horrified! If your using it for skin or nails. This is the brand. Love love coconut oil!

Using it for fat loss, and a healthy source of Medium Chain Triglycerides. I take it pre-workout and it gives a bit of an energy boost in my opinion. Great for cooking. I highly recommend this product for everyday health and or fitness goals.

Do yourself a favor and spend some time researching the health benefits of Coconut oil. The sites all recommend you make sure the product is "PURE". Now go out and find the best product at the most competitive price. You don't have to look far, Natures Way PURE organic extra Virgin Coconut Oil is it.

Summary: Once you start, you won't go back
Text: This brand is one of the best brands I have tried. It is very tasty. For cooking...you can use a couple of tablespoons of this to fry pancakes, stir fry or any other recipes that call for butter or margarine. I almost never use margarine now. I even put it on corn and my breakfast toast. Coconut oil contains Medium Chain Triglycerides which is known to aid in weight loss and lower cholesterol levels. For skin...Since hearing about coconut oil, it is the only thing I use to moisturize my skin. I even put a little on my face at night. My skin is even more beautiful now. For hair...after I wash my hair, I rub a little in while it is still wet. After it dries, there is so much sheen and shine, there is no need for anything else. FABULOUS!

This oil has many different uses.  I have cooked with it and it works and tastes good.  I have used it on my hair as well as skin and am pleased with the results.  Good price for the amount you get.  Will be ordering more once this runs out, which won't be soon because a little bit goes a long way.
The product came very quickly. It was fresh and just what I expected. Prefect for a summer time moisterizer and great to cook with!

got this product first time at the local wholefoods and got hooked. I use it as a butter to put on a toast, I add it to my meat dishes, I eat it from the spoon with my tea and apply it as a body lotion...that is how much "action" you can get out of that jar. It has a very pleasant light coconut taste and aroma. Just a very good product overall.

Summary: great coconut oil and great price!
Text: I use a lot of coconut oil. It's great for anything from moisturizing your skin to cooking vegetables. This brand is a good brand. I alternate between Nature's Way Organic and Nutiva Organic depending on whichever one is cheaper when i reorder.

Summary: You can get addicted to this stuff..
Text: What do i do with this stuff ???  I eat it... It taste great... 4 tables spoons a day...I will be reorderng soon... I just read that dogs love it to, so I will also be giving it to them... Just not as much...  Try it you will love it... To me it taste just like cream of coconut....

This product is amazing. I had no idea how many benefits one jar could have. Use it on your entire body, eat it, cook with it. It helps everything from dry skin and hair to blood pressure and diabetics. It also boosts your metabolism. If you are thinking of purchasing this product just do a google search on benefits of coconut oil and read up on it. You will not be disappointed.

This oil is not liquid at room temperature. Also, it has a relatively low smoke point. Those facts out of they way, this is a very high quality coconut oil. It smells wonderful and everything cooked in it takes on a hint of coconut. I use this in my coffee, fry eggs in it, saute spinach in it, as well as enjoy a tablespoon of it before my workouts. I have read that there are non-food related things you can do with this as well (good for skin, etc) but I have only experienced it through a culinary lens.

Summary: Hair SOOO Soft Skin so Soft
Text:
I really am happy with this product. It moisturizes my hair extremely well and doesnt leave a look of build up and absorbs beautifully. I have 4a hair in lower back length locks and absorbtion is something that is a must for anything i use in my hair.I am excited to continue using it and I also have used it on my skin. I absorbs well to the skin too leaving my skin supple but not greesy.

If you dont like the smell of coconut it may not be the product for you. But if you enjoy the smell it is very pleasant and it is not over powering.I will try mixing this into a whipped shea butter blend also for skin and let you guys know how it come out :-)
It is everything everyone said it was and more! I love it in either oatmeal or cream of wheat. will order again.

I bought this a couple of months ago after learning that coconut oil is very healthy for you. I love coconut flavor, so this was easy for me to take. I love it. I cook Shirataki noodles in it, eggs, anything. I especially love to eat hot cereal and put a dollop of coconut oil in it. It's really delish. I hope all the health claims I read are true! Start slow, though. The first week I had a lot of diarrhea. I think your body takes time to get used to it; I don't have that problem anymore.

Gosh Darn It! It looks like a glass jar but it isn't. Coconut oil is a great product but should be packaged in glass only. Need to beg my neighbor for some baby food jars to transfer the oil into. I hope baby food still comes in glass. (smile)

I purchased this product and used it for one month. I had lab work taken in February prior to starting the use of the coconut oil. Then I started using the coconut oil, in my food and on my skin. I used the whole 16 oz container in March. Then I had my labs redone in April 1st. My A1C in February was 9.7 the most recent A1C is now 7 which is almost normal. So even though I was also taking my medication, the addition of the coconut oil was the miracle in my book. I have signed up for subscribe and save and will be using the coconut oil with a shipment monthly. I was hesitant at what the results would be as I have tried other things, but it works. Used it on a skin rash as soon as it started and within two days it was gone. Try it for yourself.

Purchased Coconut oil to help punch up my HDL "good" cholesterol levels. We use it for cooking and I also may mix it in cooked vegetables like you might use butter. I like the taste and coconut oil medium chain triglycerides (MCT) are supposed to be a lot healthier for us than most vegetable oils.
Bought this for my Dad who has dementia, hoping it will help him, even a little...my Mom ended up also using it as a face cream, and loves it! She adds it to her cereal every morning, too!

I really like this product.  We use it for making microwave popcorn, cooking eggs, sauteing vegetables, etc.  When used in cooking, there is little to no coconut taste transferred to the food.  Best of all, it's a healthy fat.

I've been using coconut oil for a long time.  After reading the many compliments via various websites I gave it a try.  I mainly use it for cooking, but also oral health after brushing my teeth.  Your teeth will feel like satin after placing a 1/2 tsp. in your mouth and allowing it to melt.  Swish it around, then rinse.  I've tried numerous brands and can't say enough about this one.  Well priced, clean tasting, a hint of coconut smell.  Top quality.

After reading several of Bruce Fife's books (and they were wonderfully easy-to-read for the non-scientific type), I decided to give coconut oil a try to help with losing weight and getting my blood sugar under control. As a non-medication taking, recently diagnosed diabetic, I want to try whatever natural remedies I can find to stay off insulin and other diabetes meds, in addition to meds for cholesterol, etc. I tried taking a teaspoon or two with meals and a teaspoon btw meals and my blood sugar numbers were noticeably lower the same day. (Fife says the suggested dose is 3-4 tbs/day). The taste of this brand is fantastic, light and creamy with a delicious coconutty taste! I love coconut so I was able to eat it right from the jar, but I also tried it spread on a Wasa Crisp bread--WOW, what an easy way to get MCFAs into your diet! I will definitely be using this instead of any oils for all my cooking needs (except a little EVOO mixed together with this for salad dressing.) Also, I'm using on my skin and it feels really soft, plus you also get the internal benefits from using it on your skin! GREAT PRODUCT!

I've gone to wearing my hair "natural"--no chemical relaxers to straighten it. On advice from other African-American women who have also gone the natural route, I tried mixing coconut oil, unrefined shea butter, and aloe gel to use on my hair. The results are nothing short of miraculous! My hair is soft, shiny, and manageable. I use the braid-out/twist-out styling methods, and the resulting curls and spirals are absolutely beautiful.

Also, I've read up on the health benefits of coconut oil, so I will definitely be experimenting with it in my cooking.

This item is extremely good. If your looking for pure extra virgin Coconut oil,this is your product. I use it in my hair, on my body as a moisturizer, in my food and also as a supplement. It's the best and for a very good price.

We initially purchased Coconut Oil for dietary reasons. My wife and I had both read multiple books and articles that stated how healthy Coconut oil is and we are constantly looking for ways to improve our diets. We have since incorporated it into many aspects of our diets. In particular, its amazing with some of the juicing recipes we have come up with. I also enjoy cooking with it, but only with certain meals. Its important to note that cooking oils at high temperatures really cuts down on the nutritional content. So we always cook at lower temperatures when using Coconut or Olive oil. Anyways, we have come to love Coconut oil and it now has a permanent spot in our food pantry.

We also started making homemade soap a few years back and while we didn't use coconut oil originally, we figured we would try it since we already had jars of it sitting on our shelves. Well, to make a long story short, its now incorporated in every single one of our recipes. In fact, my favorite soap is actually a recipe that focuses specifically on the coconut oil.

Lastly, my wife one upped the soap making and started making homemade shampoo and conditioners and to say that they are amazing is a massive understatement. In particular, the conditioner she makes is unbelievable. I dont know the recipes but I do know that coconut oil is one of the major ingredients that she uses. My hair has never been softer and neither has hers. On top of that the smell is absolutely hypnotic.

Bottom line - 12 months ago Coconut oil had absolutely no place in our home. Fast forward to today and....well, it now plays an major role in our lives, both for dietary and hygienic purposes. Even if you dont make homemade soaps, the health benefits alone should be more than enough for you to incorporate Coconut oil into your diet. Its one of the healthiest oils out there.

Highly Recommended.

I use this on my face in the evening.  At first it seems really greasy, but after about 5 minutes it totally soaks in - doesn't leave any residue/stains on my pillowcase.  I also use it on my lips.  Definitely recommend :)

I purchased this after scouring onc of my favorite sites [...]  about natural ways to deal with rough, dry, feet.  I get biweekly pedicures but that gets expensive!  One of the reviewers recommended applying coconut oil daily and you'll never have to worry about rough feet again.  I have to honestly admit that she was right!  I only get a pedicure for the pampering every couple of months no longer the necessity and because of the results I apply the coconut oil to my entire body after the bath and I can't believe the difference in my skin's texture.  It's unbelievable.  The only thing about this one is during the summer months you have to find a cool place in the house to keep this such as underneath the bathroom cabinet or in the linen closet because it will liquify.  As a mattef of fact I keep it in my bedroom during showering so the steam from the shower won't won't liquify it because once it liquifies it will eventually reharden at room temperature but the consistency changes which to me also changes the chemical structure in it or something because it just doesn't moisturize the same afterwards.  But I love, love, love this product.  It's a must have.  It's has a light, chocolate fragrance to it which is a plus.

Summary: Just Like the Oil my Mama Made
Text: I am from Asian descent and we regularly use coconut oil for everything. My Mother used to make me coconut oil by shredding the meat, hand pressing the liquids, then boil the water out. This oil tastes and smells just like the kind my Mother used to spend hours making.  This is definitely worth the price for the amount of oil that you get. I use this as a hair detangler out of the shower, as make-up remover, face and body moisturizer, and lip balm. I also use it for cooking and as a dietary supplement.

Summary: Great product for great price thanks All star health
Text: I bought this product from the amazon vendor ALL STAR HEALTH and I must say it is just as described and got speedy shipment. This is great for my hair and skin. I've made Ice pops for my kid sister,her friends, and myself and they taste great. I am afro Caribbean with wavy hair opposed to super kinky hair but my hair gets really dry if I leave it out(wash n set style). But this is great for those using protective styling and for the swimmers like myself. It keeps my hair moist and doesn't weigh it down and my skin look great as well. People don't realize that the chlorine in our shower/water systems here in the states is very drying on our hair and bodies. I'm just glad I got a product that 100% natural and from a vendor who I can trust. I've been ripped off by buying hair products at walmart and supply stores. I live in a predominantly white neighborhood and it is very hard finding things that work for my hair. So, I have to go to neighborhoods out of my way or shop online. And after finding out I bought conditioner that was mixed with bleach (clorox) from an online store that turned my hair into straw/ash it can be very frustrating. So I had to cut off my hair about 5 inches and I'm re-growing it. I had to file a claim with the business bureau and everything. But, thank god for reviews or I wouldn't know where to shop or who to trust these days.

Summary: BEST OIL FOR BAKING, FRYING, SKIN SOFTENER, OR RIGHT OUT OF THE JAR
Text:
After menopause, I developed high total cholesterol. Fortunately, only the "lousy" cholesterol (LDH) increased, with my "happy" number (HDL) staying at an impressive 90. Instead of taking the recommended "liptor, et al", and as a registered nurse who knows the awful side effects of such drugs, I opted to research all things diet related. After my studies, I have decided that our government and medical community has been either ignorant, at best, or complicit, at worst, in the great soybean growers maligning of the health benefits of this oil. There are a few good scientific books available through Amazon. I'm not due for another lipid test for at least a year. I will post an update here, good or bad outcome.

Whole Foods stopped carrying this brand. I tried their new 365 brand and had to spit it out --- TOTAL PLASTIC TASTE AND SMELL. This product is in a non-leaching plastic container and is incredibly pleasant tasting raw (only do that after eating anything sweetened with sugar or honey to prevent cavities), but unbelievably delicious in cooking. Last week I was in an interview and the lady turned and smiled stating she detected a "slight, delightful hint of just-baked cookies" coming from my direction. HAD TO BE THIS OIL I always pop a little in my mouth before going out!!!!!

Watch the medical statistics that will be coming out of the country of Jamaica in the next two to three years. The soybean inudstry has recently purchased all the coconut fields, torn down the trees, and planted soybeans!!!!! If the studies I am trusting in are correct, they will begin developing a high incidence of heart disease and strokes, almost unknown to them up until now!!!!!

I absolutely love this stuff! I use it for my hair, skin,and  lips (tastes good).  I haven't cooked  with it.... Yet! It melts into the palm of your hand, no need to put it in warm water. (you may need to it you live in a place that is very cold. I live in Calif)  It absorbs into your skin and hair without feeling greasy. I wash my hair and while it is wet I put the oil in it and comb it through. I have thick curly hair and it leaves it soft when it dries. The whole family can use it. Definitely putting it on auto-order! and it is so affordable!  I recommended this to all my friends and family on FB.
This product is very good. When you taste it you feel the quality of it. It is really organic. It combines delicious taste with healthy benefits

Summary: A natural way to stay healthy
Text: I was curious about coconut oil because of it's anti viral and antibacterial properties as a natural supplement instead of using over the counter meds.. I am quite pleased.. I've started taking it everyday and I feel healthier. It tastes so good... I have yet to cook with it but I do use it as a spread on bagels or crackers.. Tastes wonderfully.. I use it on my lips and skin aswell.. It is a wonderful moisturizer... I am blown away by the many uses of this coconut oil.. I'm a believer..

Wow...I cannot believe how unbelievable this product is.  I am trying to eat healthier and find better alternatives to eating organic as well as preserve the taste of food, or even better, make it tastier.  Although it has been just a bit challenging to eat organic and also consume healthy, tasty products, this has made cutting fast foods completely out TOTALLY WORTH IT. I cannot believe I have never cooked with coconut oil before.  I used it with my ordinary seafood dish and popcorn butter substitute.  It melts immediately and adds a crisp to whatever savory dish you are making.  The faint, but identifiable taste of coconut oil makes the dish even BETTER.  SERIOUSLY, WHO WOULD HAVE THOUGHT?  With all the positive reviews, purchasing an item for the first time can be a tiny, wee bit difficult for a newbie.  However, if you are planning to eat healthy and use better cooking alternative oils and saturate your food with a bit more fat (good fat), use coconut oil.  Since this was the brand and product that immediately popped up when I was looking for coconut oil, I will say this is a very high quality and yummmmmmy item to purchase.  I will definitely incorporate more coconut oil in most of all my dishes as I cook many of meals.  Although I have not yet cooked a sweet dish using coconut oil, I am assuming it will be quite delicious as well.  I still cannot get over how additionally tasty my food is with this new additional to my cooking ingredient cart.  So worth it...I recommend this product to everyone and will be talking my family into this cooking alternative immediately.  Delicious and healthy.

This really smells good..... it smooths my hands, love putting it on after a hot shower smooths my skin. Great for my hair, it absorbs and smooths out my hair, leaving it silky and manageable. I love Coconut oil...it couldn't get more healthy.
This is an excellent product, good for 160 or more areas of treatment and nutrition, delicious plain on a rice cracker, wonderful in salad dressings.

I bought this coconut oil because my older sister uses it on her skin at night and she has such smooth, wrinkle-free skin. I love this stuff. It smells great of course, I use it in my hair, skin, cuticles and you can even eat it! It is a lot of product so it's a really good value. It is stored at room temp. and is great for just about any use.
Love this stuff. So yummy, and the dogs love it too!  So glad that I bought it, and will keep doing it over and over again.
This product works great on my hair as a hot oil treatment and conditioner.  It is also great for skin care and is gentle enough for children.
Product just as described, smells & tastes awesome. I really plan on making lotion with it. Not expired and packaged great!

Summary: Good for oil pulling and consumption
Text:
I decided to try oil pulling, and selected this coconut oil to try with. I will say - I'm not sure if I buy into the whole coconut oil pulling "thing", but anything's worth a shot! I found that it's best (for me) to put a glob of the oil UNDER my tounge to melt. Just sticking a glob in my mouth on top of my tounge made me want to barf. After it melts under my tounge, I can swish it - and the taste is very subtle. It almost feels like I'm just swishing saliva around.

I also decided to start incorporating this oil into my morning cup of coffee as I've seen other reviews mention. It doesn't really add any taste, but is an easy way to get this in my body - also moisturizes my lips as I drink it! Yum!

I haven't tried any other coconut oils, but this seems to fit the bill - no complaints!

I love this coconut oil! I use it to take off makeup, as a moisturizer, as a conditioner, and as a cooking oil!

As a makeup remover, I use it on dry skin and rub the oil in for around a minute. Then using a warm/hot towel, I let the towel sit on my face until cool. I repeat the process with the towel 2-3 times (depending on how much makeup I have on) and then in slow, circular motions, I rub the makeup off with my towel. It takes off all my makeup, my waterproof mascara, and my sunblock. It leaves my skin feeling clean but not stripped of oil.

As a moisturizer, I use it only at night (too oily to use in the morning), after my toner and green cream. I take a little bit and warm it in the palm of my hand. I rub it into my dry spots (which have sometimes crop up due to my use of green cream) and follow up with a cream-based moisturizer to seal it in. I put a bit around my eyes and some on my eyelashes and eyebrows. In the morning, my skin looks plump and remarkably fresh! I love it!

As a conditioner, I place a little bit of it in damp hair and leave it in overnight. After washing, my hair (which has been permed, colored, bleached, and ironed to hell and back) feels soft and conditioned!!

As a cooking oil, I just use it like I would use olive oil or any other cooking oil. There have been claims that this oil will help with weight loss, but I haven't really noticed any of that. I use it mainly because it smells delicious!! It's great when making curry!

I would highly recommend this to anyone!

I purchased this after trying other Coconut Oil.  This has a better taste than others, I love it and cannot wait to begin getting my shipments.  I may have to up the frequency of my shipment as I'm using it in all sorts of dishes.
A quick net search can tell you all the things coconut oil is good for, take your pick. I like this product for everything.  A little goes a long way, can't be without it.
I use this in my Shea Butter Whips, and it just smells soooo good. I have tried others but this one is the best.

NATURES WAY IS A VERY REPUTABLE SUPPLEMENT COMPANY. This organic coconut oil has a smooth taste and great flavor. It taste and smells like real coconut without any artificial junk. I am a nutritionist & vegetarian & consume only organic and chemical free food. This coconut oil fulfills all the excellent health benefits of coconut oil.

This coconut oil is a great product, and at a good price on Amazon.  Organic, unrefined coconut oil can be expensive when purchased locally.  I started using this regularly for cooking and baking, and I'm very pleased with the results!  It's delicious on toast, waffles and pancakes, and perfect for stir-frying vegetables and meats, as it has a better heat tolerance than olive oil.  Also, I believe it's helped me with my cholesterol imbalance. I tested once at a low HDL (good) level.  After some research on the benefits of unrefined coconut oil on cholesterol, I gave it a try.  A recent blood test confirmed an increase to a healthy HDL level, as well as a low LDL (bad) level.

I've been using coconut oil for a few years now and am pleased to see that its benefits are finally being touted...now that saturated fat is no longer villainified, thank goodness. Coconut oil's praises are long overdue! We used to buy more expensive coconut oil; but these are tough economic times, so we've been using cheap coconut oil. I read all the great reviews on this site and can't believe that for the cheap price, it's organic AND cold-pressed/hexane-free. We've got another brand of what I'd loosely dub coconut oil sitting in the cabinet next to this brand, and although they are similar in price, that's where the similarities end. That stuff is going in the garbage where it belongs. I could barely even taste coconut when using it. I won't go back.

I eat about 3 tbsp of this stuff per day and, naturally, it's satisfying. As soon as you open the jar, you can smell the coconut. And the taste...delicious! If you're already a fan of coconut oil and are aware of its healthy properties, try this brand. You won't be sad that you did. And if you're just learning about its merits, this coconut oil is perfect to start using. If you don't like it, you haven't really lost much money. I "subscribed" to this product in order to ensure that I've always got a fresh tub on hand!

Great product!  I use it for cooking and in my smoothies.  The flavor is wonderful, and it always seems to bring out the natural flavors of meat and seafood.  It has also helped me control and lose weight.  I weighed in at 205 lbs at the beginning of the year and with proper diet, exercise and a spoonful of coconut oil daily, I have lost 25 lbs.  If you want to cut out salt and sugar from your diet but not taste, try cooking with coconut oil.  It will enhance the flavors of your food and help you fix those nasty cravings.

This product is great. I use it on my and my baby after showers/baths and it has cleared up my skin from many different blemishes (Dry spots, red patches and red bumps I have had for years). I have also used it on my hair and it has helped get rid of the dry brittle frizz.
Since I use it everyday it has helped me not to get sunburned.
I also have used it on popcorn (so good) and with cooking rice. Can't wait to find more cooking uses for it.
Also a very good price and I love that I don't have to go to the store to get more when I run out.

My hair, for the most part, is healthy & easy to maintain, but I couldn't grow it past the middle of my back. At that point, the ends become terribly brittle & eventually fray. However, that's no longer a problem since I started using coconut oil as a deep conditioner. The jar says to apply 1-2 hours before washing your hair, but it's obviously better if you leave it in longer. After one use (overnight), my split ends were substantially reduced, all the strands felt smooth from root to tip, & my waves were at their bounciest! Not only is it the most effective solution I've come across, it's also natural & the cheapest.

I can't really comment on its other curative properties aside from skincare. I would advise against it in favor of jojoba oil. Coconut oil is heavier & may clog pores. However, it doesn't deserve to get knocked for that considering how well it works on hair.

Also, the oil will congeal if it gets in the low 70s. Don't freak out, it's still good & less messy to apply since you can get a good amount on your fingers. If you can't get down like that, just put it in hot water & it will return to its liquid state. Oh, and be careful if you intend to take it as a supplement. You have to ease your body into it & only take a little at a time, like if you're trying to build an immunity to arsenic. Unknowingly, I took the recommended amount (jar, I trusted you!) & proceeded to have my insides torn apart.

So, if you can remember these tips, you'll be well on your way to beautiful hair!

I love this product. I use it three ways. First I use it as a daily skin moisturizer. It leaves my skin soft and moisturized all day without a heavy oily feel. I also use it as part of my hair regimen. I mix it with shea butter and jojoba oil to moisturize my natural locs. Finally, it is food grade. I use it as a spread on toast instead of butter and jams. It has a light sweet taste. Overall, I love this product and it is of high quality.

This coconut oil smells divine.  I love to use it for moisturizing my hair, since I am going natural, and am not quite ready for the big chop.  The oil is light, and I love it. Makes my hair smell so wonderful.

I love the versatality of this oil. It is good coconut oil but not to strong. I use it on my skin, hair and had a teaspoon or 2 in my cocoa tea and it works well in all. I am not certain about the usage on my face though - my skin started feeling a bit dry after a few applications at night. So I am still looking into that. All in all it is a good product for a good price!

I love this stuff! I have 4c natural hair and this coconut oil penetrated and moisturized my hair like nobodies business. I've had this since August 2010 and I'm just now purchasing another one so it will take you far.

I ordered on January 9th and received it on January 11th. Amazing : )
I've never purchased or used Coconut Oil - organic or otherwise - but I've been checking out some of it's health benefits. After reading the positive reviews and seeing the great low price, I had to try it.
I've been battling dry mouth and thought I'd coat my tongue and gums before I go to bed. Maybe it will help "seal in" the moisture. Who knows. If it doesn't, it's a delicious mistake. It's REALLY YUMMY!
I'd definitely recommend it -

EFAGold Coconut Oil is wonderful. I use this product in my hair to seal in moisture (love it). A little goes a long way, so be very light-handed if using in the hair. The shipment was quick I have no complaints!

Great product, tastes great. I mixed this with some banana cream pudding and it was heavenly. The coconut flavor and smell it gives is incredible. I also add 2 tblsp to my green tea with honey and it gives my tea that extra yum factor. Will be reordering this product and i am currently actively trying out new recipes for this. I bought 2-16 oz jars, but i can quickly see that will not be enough as i will be using it on skin and hair. This is the real deal, it is not the refined oil you find in grocery stores. Refined vs Unrefined, i'll go with unrefined.

If you want soft skin, shiny hair, strong bones, good digestion and something that tastes great, you will want to buy this!  And, as a side benefit, I have lost 4 lbs in just two weeks by eating 1 tbsp a half hour before meals.

I've had this product for a total of 48 hours and I'm raving about it already, it tastes AMAZING you can literally not go wrong with this product. Don't like the results on your hair? Try it on that dry patch of skin you have. Not healing it quick enough? Put it on a piece of toast. Coconut flavor too strong? Bake with it as a substitute for other butters/oils in recipes. And statistically, how can one person not be happy with at least one of these options that coconut oil offers? Honestly, this is the smartest purchase I have ever made, I will never go back to putting butter on toast, the coconut flavor is absolutely delicious. The texture is much lighter and it just smells so.amazingly.GOOD. I love how the subtle taste infused into my sunny side up egg, and although I haven't tried it in other foods yet, I'm REALLY looking forward to doing so IMMEDIATELY!!
Who knew coconut oil lowers cholesteral? We added one tablespoon per day. Fasting cholesterol test show it cut my trigliceride number in half.

I gave this to my cousin who has been struggling for eczema since childhood (now 35yr). He used it and his skin completely cleared up. My gf also uses this and her dry cracked skins are now even smoother than mine! As smooth as a babies bottom!

Nature's Way coconut oil is amazingly gentle. I was able to orally take 4 TBS daily within 2 weeks of starting this oil with no diarrhea. It brought my blood pressure down from 150/80 to 126/62.
