My skin soaks it up and looks younger. I eat it with my meals. It has a mild, pleasant coconut taste. It is doing many good things internally that Iam not even aware of.
I use coconut oil for my hair like a regular hair mask 15 min. before duche.Your hair will feel the differens.Good product.

Bought this organic coconut oil as a nutritional supplement..for myself...and for 2 baby squirrels I am raising (according to a squirrel rehab expert, coconut oil is great for baby squirrels because of the many similarities between the fats in coconut oil and the fats in mother squirrel milk.)  Anyway, both myself and the squirrels love it!  It tastes great just on its own...I'm looking forward to trying it as a spread on whole wheat bread.  I recommend this product very highly...it's delicious!

I LOVE THIS FOR MY HAIR! I am caucasian with blonde highlighted hair. My hair strands are fine but I do have a lot of hair and it is relatively long. My scalp is also naturally a little oily. My hair is healthy, but I do need deep conditioning though as I expose my hair to a lot of elements. (I give all of this detail in case someone is making the decision for themselves as identifies with my hair profile.)

My Hubby is a hairdresser / salon owner and because of this I get to try all kinds of hair products. I've even had expensive caviar shampoo and conditioner (As I roll my eyes). I've used other oils in my hair and most require several washings to get the oil out. Not this Coconut Oil. I put it on my dry hair at night and wrap a satin wrapping cap around it while I sleep. (available near the relaxer s in the hair care section of the store) When I wake I shampoo an condition like normal and my hair looks amazing! I use it twice a week now!

THE GOOD

Nothing and I mean nothing has made my hair feel as silky and look as shiny as this Coconut Oil.

The oil starts out think like crisco but melts in your hands when rubbed together quickly. This consistency makes it super easy to apply.

It isn't runny or drippy.

Amazingly "repairs" hair after too much sun, surf, chlorine etc.

When washed it does not leave a fragrance behind.

No Chemicals! 100% Organic and good for you!

THE TRICKY

It smell of the coconut is rich and luscious and I love it - but it was hard to ignore it when I woke up or turned over in the night. It only took about two applications though for me to get used to it.

I originally purchased this to use a something to give juicyness and flavor to plain meals such as chicken breast and spinach. I ate some of this with coconut cookies and couldn't stop until I accepted that it is oil... so I can't be eating insane amounts of it. Very nice that it has good fats in it as well. I used a bit as  moisturizer for my face after it was quite dry and my face was supppppppper hydrated and moist after, so make sure you barely put as much as the size of this 'O' on your finger tip.

My hair is in love!!! I really like it :)
Soft and shiny was the result after I used this in my curly hair.
Watch out: A little bit goes a long way!!!
Even better with rosemary oil.

I bought this jar after eating coconut water for years and continuously hearing about how beneficial the oil is.  Didnt even use it until my scalp was getting dried out, threw some of this in my hair and saw incredible results within days. This works great on everything and is pure enough to simply eat right outta the jar. Couldnt recommend it more

Just recently purchased this product, having never used it as a stand alone product.  Usually use products that contain coconut oil.  I found this to be a great moisturizer for both skin and hair, and it smells wonderful.  Both my young nieces use it for their skin and also love it.  One of my nieces thinks it smells like pound cake!  It is an oil though, so it's hard to use as a moisturizer right out of the jar, so I put it in a spray bottle.  Much better.  I recommend this for a good moisturizer.

I love this product and use it in place of virgin olive oil for sauteing at high temperatures.
Also use a little on my skin: it's very moisturizing. I purchased it from Amazon.

Summary: Great for natural hair care & great add for smoothies!
Text: Love this addition to my everyday health. This is my second hair journey after the BIG CHOP and my hair loves the coconut oil!! This a great moisturizer from head to toe. I also add a tablespoon to my Body by Vi shakes, which provides me more energy (much needed in the AM!). Love this!

Summary: best beauty product Iv'e ever used
Text: I just bought a second jar of coconut oil because I'm almost done with my first and I don't want to run on E. I use this as a skin moisturizer, hair deep conditioner, I sometimes eat a spoon from my fridge stack ( cuz it does taste good.) I love the smell  too. I even use it as a makeup remover and I use it as a lip balm mixed with Shea butter lips feels so smooth. I have people complement me on my skin tone and how smooth my skin is. I don't tell too many people about it because those who are not aware of any oil benefit automatically assumes its like corn oil or any other cooking oil and are put off by it.  Not me I've read plenty about it and I am never going without it again.  I haven't used used another brand of coconut oil but I will say that the best type is cold compressed coconut oil and organic extra virgin.

I really love coconut oil, I use it it seems for just about everything. I use it to make my toothpaste, as a moisturizer and a little bit in my hair. I also use it on my dogs dry skin. It's really great for your underarms because of the antibacterial properties it has. This is a cold pressed unrefined coconut oil meaning it smells & tastes like coconuts. I would highly recommend this product.

I absolutely love this stuff! After seeing a pin on pinterest I origionally bought this for my face as a natural moisterizer. BUT I began eating this instead. This makes cinnamon and sugar toast AMAZING! I use this instead of butter in almost any recipe and it makes it healthier but still tastes great!

I recently moved to Colorado, where it is always dry. Moisturizing body lotions alone just don't cut it for me. A friend introduced me to Nature's Way Coconut Oil and I fell in love. I mix it with my regular body lotion before applying it. My skin stays moisturized, feels baby soft, and does not feel oily. I have a problem with fragrances in general, and was at first worried about smelling like a coconut. However, that is not a problem at all; there is no scent. I've ordered this product twice so far and will continue to do so.

Use it on my skin (face) to prevent dryness. Absorbs well into skin, doesn't cause breakout. Seems to be quite pure and delectable. I've tasted it as well and it seems fresh.

Recommended.

Nature's Way Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 16 Ounce
I have never used/eaten coconut oil before. I read it was really good. I thought I would give it a try when I bought a Whirley Pop. This is so very good with making popcorn ... I add a little bit of butter too. I was pleasantly surprised at the smell and how good this taste. I even eat small amounts right out of the jar. I must say, not all coconut oil is the same. I ran out so I bought more coconut oil at a local grocery store. It is not the same, I am so disappointed. The aroma isn't there. I should have never wasted my money, and just came here to order more.
This is the best cocnut oil i have used, after about 1 month i noticed significant results on my scar healing. This is a great product at a nice price.
This is a great price for organic extra virgin coconut oil...I love the smell of fresh coconut and use it on my skin as a moisturizer and on all my cooking. awesome!

Summary: I can't buy enough of this stuff. I use it for everything
Text: I got introduced to coconut oil about 1 year ago and i am crazy about the stuff. I use it for cooking to replace all other oils i used to use. I use it as a body lotion. I use it as a deep conditioner for my hair before getting in the shower. I mix it with baking soda to make a natural deodorant (that works every bit as good, if not better than anything you'd buy at the store.) It works as a massage oil. Basically, it's a miracle product that is useful in so many ways and is sooo good for you.
Extremely good product and versatile. I like Nature's Way and this is just another product I use daily. I use it for cooking and as a skincare product! Two for the price of one.

Lots of uses, fried Chicken in it, tender and juicy, just a slight coconut flavor, not overwhelming, made the house smell awesome. I use it on my hair as a deep conditioner and also on dry skin in the winter.

I originally purchased this product to use on my hair. It has made my hair healthier, stronger and softer. I also use it to pop popcorn. Gives it an excellent flavor- so much better than butter. And healthier. My puppy loves coconut oil too. Anytime I am in the bathroom conditioning my hair with it she will run in and beg for a bite. She's very healthy, has a beautiful coat and is energetic. I think this product is working well for both of us!!

After hearing about all the amazing benefits for coconut oil, I decided to buy a jar. It works great on my hair when I put it in and let it stay overnight and wash it out in the morning, hair is healthier and doesn't break off.
It's great for my face and a lot better than the otc acne medication, the only thing about it is I can't put it on EVERY night or it'll redden and irritate my face. Every other night seems to work fine though.
And it's delicious and really helps with weight loss when eaten in very small amounts.

I'm a huge fan of this stuff and would recommend it to everyone.

I was looking for castor and almond oil when I saw this product and after reading all the great reviews I ordered it to give it a try.
Just LOVE IT!!! It smells delicious and it is an excellend moisturizer. It has helped me in improving the dry skin in my elbows, my feet, atenuate the expression lines and help preventing stretch marks in my pregnant belly.

Delivery came on time. Nicely and safely packaged. Coconut oil came congealed. At warm temperature, it will liquidify.
Great for dry skin. Smells good too. Apply onto hair for silky smooth hair. I use it at night, leave it on, cover my pillow with a towel. Not sure about cooking, but I used as a salad dressing oil and it tasted yummy.

I got this coconut oil because my cousin told me about it and i love it!!! it's excellent to cook with or just to eat a teaspoon of it at a time, or to put in your hair for a treatment or to rub on your skin if it's too dry, this coconut oil helps sooooo much! It works great for me with my type2 diabetes and circulation problems i have in my legs! this stuff has really helped me get better!!!!!
I bought this because coconut oil is good for body, and the smell is irresistible to me, it is so good flavor and we all like it.

i bought this particular oil because of the reviews and i have to say they were all right. my hair is shiny and looks healthy. i have medium long, curly hair that i let dry naturally and this oil its juts perfect. my sking is healthy and without any blemishes, definitely will buy again with subscribe and save.

Summary: Coconut oil for a variety of uses!
Text: Great price & nice oil, I use it for gargling; healthy gums. Also great for popping corn. The price was more reasonable compared to local discount stores.

i bought this because i was looking for something that would help dry skin. this is the best stuff i have ever used and it softens skin very quickly. i will definately stick with this for my skin. works great for dry hair too.
this is the yes coconut oil ever will buy from here again. smells amazing and tastes really good and this stuff is very good for you!

Just received my coconut oil today and I am over the moon excited about this product!!! It has so much versatility! I'm was going to just use it for my natural hair, but I decided to order another one today for the other health benefits! Fast shipping, always a plus! This product is a must have!!!

The jar came in good shipping time and perfect order. I use this oil in cold cereal and hot coffee. It has a very mild coconut flavor and velvety smooth texture. It is not sweet at all but neutral. And from what I have read on the subject it is very good for you! I love all kind of coconut!
I love coconut oil and this product is great the jar has a good opening so i can get the product with out it being messy. love love love it!! Great buy.
Coconut Oil is supposed to be very good for you.  It has a great taste and I can see many meals using it to cook with.

First of all, the fragrance is subtle and heavenly and I love it. I noticed an immediate improvement in my skin. It's softer, and not just on the surface -- it feels healthier deep down and the tone is more even. I use it on my face as well. I prefer natural products, so I read up on the benefits of virgin coconut oil and then checked out the reviews here on Amazon. I completely agree with all of the positive things customers have written about this product. It's wonderful and has so many uses that are healthy and beneficial. It smells good, tastes good and feels good and I can't imagine being without it now. I'm hooked for good -- a lifer!

I think this stuff is wonderful tasting, and it's very healthy too. I'm also using it on a couple of dry patches on my skin (no, not in any weird places, folks) and it acts as a great moisturizer.

I'm probably gonna buy about 100 more jars and put them in the underground shelter.
I am very impressed with this product my mother has alzheimer's and this product has brought her back from the brink. It has a lovely smell and the price is very good compard to the other brands
I use this as a body lotion as well as in lip balm that I make.  It is consistently a good product.

I was trying to do a frugal birthday list for myself (total of all gifts less than $50) last September and decided to ask for this organic coconut oil.  My husband bought it for me and I have used it as a deep moisturizer about twice a week.  I can't describe the soul-satisfying scent or the elegant feel of rubbing this into my skin at night!  It's like eating an ice cream sundae without a single calorie...and the jar has lasted me almost 10 months! I highly recommend this coconut oil.

I use this primarily to prevent diaper rash on my son. We use cloth diapers and coconut oil is safe on them. Since buying the jar, I've used it to treat mild sunburns, cracked nipples, chapped lips, dry elbows, cradle cap... there isn't much coconut oil cannot moisturize!
This is a great deal on coconut oil and a much better healthy alternative to regular cooking oils. Also great in smoothies.

I used this product several times and it did make my hair smell and feel soft.be sure to put it in hot water before using it.
If you love the smell of coconut its a added plus.

Summary: Nature's way Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil
Text: The product was received promptly.  The price was right and I will use this supplier in the future.  Great product to use.  I use one tablespoon of Coconut oil in unsweetened hot cocoa.  Great way to use this product for health.

This is a great product. I use coconut oil in almost all my cooking now, since it's so much healthier. It's all organic, tastes great on everything. A little goes a long way, and needs to be on low heat, it burns fast, so just be careful if you use high heat, it will burn up right away.

I've been using it almost a year now, in all my cooking, and have it on subscribe and save about every 6 months. It's fantastic. I truly enjoy it.
I use this for hair care and as a supplement. It works for me and my hair has been healtier since I've started using it. The health benefits are enormous and I can't wait to see results.

I'm actually loving this multifuctional product. A little goes a long way so I'll probably get it every other month. I use it in my cooking & skin/hair care. I can't speak about all the benefits just yet because I've been only using the oil a little over a month. I'm happy thus far.

Summary: The Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is great!!
Text: The Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is great!! I apply the oil to my skin frequently. It is very good quality and it smells very good!! It is also good to eat!!

I love this stuff.  I go through it so fast.  This is my favorite brand.  I like it better than Nutiva texture.  There are no particles in it.  Nutiva has small particles which is supposed to be completely normal and their may even been some benefits to it but I just prefer it without them. I absolutely HATE coconuts because of the texture so that is probably why it bothers me.Nutiva is still a good brand but this is better!

I have been using coconut oil as a body/face/hair moisturizer for about a year now and it has made all the difference in the world for my health. After doing a bit of research, I chose this product in particular due to the description, reviews, pricepoint, and the fact that it is a brand I have seen in many stores and am familiar with.

The non-processed nature of this oil meets my skincare and haircare needs, but also makes it perfect for cooking as well. I bought it to use in the shower but now I cannot stop eating it on everything! It has a wonderfully light coconut smell and flavor, which is clearly natural and not from any artificial colorings or flavors. This is the best brand of coconut oil I have ever bought and it blends into my skin quickly and softly without feeling overly oily, tastes amazing, and washes out of my hair easily.

My only complaint would be that it is packaged in a plastic container. While I am not too worried about the plastic leaching chemicals into the oil itself, I will be buying this product for the rest of my life and I'm sure I will be accumulating a lot of these plastic jars! Though they're recyclable, a glass jar would get reused immediately in my house. Other than that, I am perfectly pleased with this product! For the price, this can't be beat, it's worth spending the ~$10 to try it.

Note: I couldn't find where this coconut product was harvested from on Amazon or the EfaGold website, but the bottle itself says it's a product of the Phillipines.

I ordered this after having a facial where they used a mixture of almond oil, coconut oil and tamanu oil. My skin felt so wonderful, I had to try it for myself! She recommended just getting coconut oil. I actually really like that it solidifies so that I can just rub a little in my palms to heat it and apply it to my face & body. It does feel a bit greasy at first, but absorbs nicely and my skin has never felt or looked better. (I'm also using diluted apple cider vinegar as an astringent.)

Now I need to try some of the other uses for coconut oil!

Summary: Great moisturizer for hair and skin!
Text: I love this product It is a great moisturizer for my hair as well as my skin. The smell is subtle but pleasing. I leave it in my hair overnight and it easily washes out in the morning. It also keeps my skin soft. It works very well for dry cracked heels. I just bought 2 more jars. I have not cooked with it!

I originally purchased this item because my mom has been using Coconut Oil for years and her skin is always so soft, smooth and flawless.  She told me she uses it on her hair and it worked wonders.  So after researching it's benefits on the internet I decided to purchase some.  This brand had the best reviews.  I used it as a leave in conditioner on my transistioning hair (I'm afro american) and it gave me a new head of soft hair!  My hair was damaged from dying my hair after a relaxer and it started breaking and shedding extremly bad.  After using the coconut oil one time my hair is moisturized all the way to my ends, no shedding, shiny, non greasy, and just plain beautiful.  I've also decided to use it in cooking too.  I HIGHLY recommend trying some, you won't regret it!! And it tastes and smells wonderful!!

Summary: Best extra virgin coconut oil I have used..
Text: I have tried many extra virgin coconut oil from wholefoods before, but this Naturesway product ranks as the best. Known for being a healthy dietary supplement, it also serves as multi-purpose.

I only cook with this coconut oil.  It's wonderful and adds a delightful taste to veges.  I fry eggs in it. I fry steaks in it.  I saute veges in it. It's yummy and keeps perfectly on your kitchen counter.  It does not have to be refrigerated.  I will not be without this stuff in my kitchen.

I love organic coconut oil and feel it is a must in our diet. I just couldn't stomach the $16 price tag from Whole Foods anymore for the exact same product. I received it today, it has the exact same exp date on the package (I know that is an issue with some items on Amazon, products being too close to the exp date and maybe that is why you got it at a bargain price).
Came well packaged with the seal intact, no problems. I will buy it again from this seller. And with Amazon Prime, it makes it a super bargain!
Also, if you are doing your research on the many amazing properties coconut oil possesses, you know that it is anti-bacterial. I discovered almost 3 yrs ago that I was allergic to antiperspirant/deo. My armpits would itch and I would scratch them almost raw. When I stopped using anti/deo, the itch stopped. Looking around online, this happens to many people. What to do? Well, I went to Whole Foods and bought plenty of natural deos that did not work AT ALL! Good for me they take back anything, including used deo. I researched and found a recipe for coconut oil deo. It has cornstarch, baking soda, and coconut oil. I followed a recipe, (google coconut oil deodorant recipe) formed it into an old deo container, and what do you know? It works like a charm! NO ODOR! It does not stop sweat, but guess what folks? You are supposed to sweat under your armpits, it is your body's way of detoxifying itself. Sweat smells when the bacteria from the skin and the perspiration meet in a dark, warm place- the armpit. The EVCO inhibits the production of bacteria. You have a serious amount of lymph nodes there that need the freedom to move toxins out of your body. And we wonder why women get breast cancer more and more these days. When I have important social events or meeting I use a regular antiperspirant, but 90% of the time I use this. Keep in fridge in warmer climates, it melts at 76 degrees F.

Coconut oil is truly amazing stuff, give it a try. Can't hurt.

i eat it, use it in my hair, and use as a moisturizer. My skin seems smoother and wrinkles seem less noticeable.  I have extremely dry skin and this does not break me out.  My bf has really oily skin and it works great on him as well!  This coconut oil is amazing!!

Right after showering, put a dab in palm. It starts to melt and then rub it in feet, legs, elbows, tops of hands...It is amazing. Real lasting moisturizing skin softener. And all natural. Smells great too.
This coconut oil is perfect for the cost.  Extra virgin? check! Organic? check! Unrefined, cold-pressed? check! So many uses, cooking, skin care, hair care, etc.

I can not get EXtra virgin coconut oil around here. my stores simply do not carry it expect for the nutrician places which are high priced. I had tonsillitis and this was receommend on soothing the iratation involved. It worked wonderfully. the taste was good and the price was very reasonable for my area. Thank you

It worked wonders on myhair! Its good right off the spoon, my dogs love it on their crunchy food that before they never wanted to eat! I also add it in my oatmeal. Also works wonders for feet massages! So many uses, went thru a whole bottle in probably 2 weeks because I love it so much!
This Coconut Oil product is nothing short of amazing! It makes a delicious body moisturizer, a flavour enhancer over breakfast cerea or in hot chocolate for a "coconutty" flavour. Highly recommended.

Summary: I enjoy the many uses of this product
Text: I love coconut oil for everything. There are so many use for this. I use it for a hair and skin conditioner. I cook with it as a healthy oil not for flavor. It doesn't really have flavor. I love that it is organic and extra virgin. It was shipped promptly and it did not leak at all. It has a safety seal on it so it can't leak unless it was already opened or perhaps busted. I add this to my smoothies. It helps keep you regular if you use it on a daily basis. I will be ordeering this again. I like what this product do for me. I am on a weight management program and I use this as one of my tools to help me. You do not need to refrigerate this unless you want it solid. I store mine in the cabinet I don't mind it being an oil form.

Summary: Smells good, tastes good, moisturizes good
Text: I've both cooked with this and used it as lotion and it has been exactly what I was looking for in both.  I've also used it as a leather conditioner treatment on my saddle and boots and it worked great for that as well.  It has a great nutty type of smell, I was concerned that when I cooked with it, it would be over powering but it wasn't.

I love coconut oil i use it for everything its so moisturizing and it has so many uses only around for me was the packaging coconut oil is in solid form but melts when heated so it should have been a zip lock or something since it did leak all over the box other then that love it.

I love, love, love this product. The other coconut oil that I bought at a local super market taste like lard....yuck. This is creamy and a coconut lovers dream. If you want good tasting food and a great looking body and skin, get this product!!! You really can't go wrong!!!

Great price if you suscribe. I use this product for cooking. It adds a light coconut flavor to less flavorful foods, like tofu. I also use it  on my skin, and I use it on my hair. It is a good moisturizer and does not leave my skin or my hair greasy. It is quite the versatile product. I have not seen all the benefits touted by advocates of coconut oil, but I've only been using the product for a month. I would  recommend this product for anyone wanting to try coconut oil.

I didn't know what to expect from this product.  Others speak of using it on their hair, skin, & etc...I chose to use it for cooking.  This Coconut Oil has to be the cleanest tasting, delicious product I have ever used to fry with.  I cannot eat foods that have a lot of grease, so this product is perfect for me.  It does not taste oily at all & the taste of your foods come through, not like other cooking oils.  I will absolutely continue to purchase more.

Summary: First try with virgin coconut oil
Text:
I recently started with the coconut oil. I tried the Louana product I got at the local Kroger. No flavor, but it was a start. After reading the various reviews, I thought I'd try this since this seemed such a reasonable price.
I am quite happy with it. The coconut taste is fine and definitely different than the Louana, so I mixed the two to make it go further and make the Louana more flavorful and economize my use of coconut oil.

This is a great product just as all of the other reviewers have stated.  Much to my surprise, this tastes so much better than the other coconut oil that I bought regularly before.  This one has a much more coconutty taste.  Plus this one is Extra Virgin so it is healthier than the Expeller pressed that I used to buy.  Better price and better quality.  I love this coconut oil.
The coconut oil works great on my hair and skin. my hair responded great to the oil and it grew a little because of the oil.
I'm taking this product since last week (just 5 days until now) and will see the results soon. The flavor is good and the quality too, the delivery was ok.
I love coconut oil it is great for all sorts of stuff! I use it as a lotion and for oil pulling! This is a wonderful product!
This is by far the best coconut oil ever.....its so light,and melt right in your hands......I would most def. Recommond this coconut oil to anyone....I use it for my hair and it works great!!!

I love this product. I bake with it and use it on my skin.  I have always had an issue with dry skin, but the Coconut Oil keeps my skin moisture all day. I especially love it on my natural hair, no more dry scalp. I have recommended this to most of my friends. Will buy more in the future.

I bought this and another brand to try and both are equally as good.  I do like the clear container that this comes in though better so this is the brand I will stick with.  It comes in a clear plastic container and I don't notice any plastic taste as others have commented on coconut oil in general.  I just put a big spoonful in my magic bullet when I make smoothies!  So yummy!!  You can eat this straight out of the jar if you want to also.  It is good!  When I first got it (shipped in the winter), it was pretty firm and I had to scrape it with a spoon to get it out..like candle wax.  But once it warmed up a bit..just room temperature, it is very soft now.  It still is a solid though, but easier to work with.  It is similar to the inside of an Almond Joy candy bar at room temp.  I can't comment on health affects since I am a relatively healthy person with bloodwork that shows great results..so far, but am only 34 yrs old.  I love coconut and hope it can help with brain function, memory mostly..lol.  I hope if I start taking it now, it will help long term. Once I run out, I will be getting the largest jar for my money!  My husband and kids love the smoothies made with this! It's not overpowering either..just the perfect hint of coconut among the other fruit and veggies. I made mango, pineapple, banana, and coconut smoothies that were just awesome!! Even all blended up well, you can still see the tiny white coconut flakes within the smoothies. Just yummy!!

I use this coconut oil for cooking, face cream and as a nutritional supplement.
The quality is extraordinary! Once you try this you will not want any other coconut oil.
this is a great product. excellent taste. great price and value. if you're looking for coconut oil to add MCT's to your diet, this is a great option.

I use this on my hair and on my skin after my bath or shower.  It is light so it doesn't weigh down your hair and gives your skin the moisture it needs without being greasy.  I've seen a big difference in my skin and my hair since using this over the last 4 months. Great product!

I love this product. I love the smell, the taste and the way I feel when I use this product. I try to use it in every way possible. I put it in my oatmeal for a satisfying,longlasting hunger satisfier. I also spread it on toast instead of butter. Yummy, what a treat and so healthy!
We use this in place of a lotion for our 5 month old.  It is light, very moisturizing an has a subtle coconut smell, which is something that was missing from the last kind we tried.

I am so happy I found this product, I actually just ran out of my coconut oil that I ordered from a online site, so I was looking for something I could get my hands onto all the time. Great smell, and plenty to last me. Im natural, with a 4c hair type and this is the best for my hair along with other carrier oils or alone! Great plus that I got to use the free trial of amazon prime!! I will be buying this product again.

This is so wonderful that I have to put it on the saver program with Amazon.  I use this for everything, from cooking to putting it on right after the shower to putting it in mine and my children's hair before I condition wash our hair.  I even put it in my Chai tea and it's wonderful on toast, infact it's so great that I don't need any other type of spread like mayo or anything, it's absolutely delicious.  My youngest doesn't like the smell but what does she know, she's only 9, everyone else in the house loves it.  My first jar lasted about a month, but I had to split some of it up so I'd have some in the bathroom and the rest in the kitchen.  I like that it doesn't liquify until you put in on your skin, it only liquified once(it was over 75 degress where I had it) and I put in the frig, however; when I took it out it was too hard.  You'll be very happy when you purchase this and needless to say it came very quickly, I'm on the prime membership so I rec'd it in 2 days.  I love it so much that I'm having a fit because I ran out. Just another note for this (3/12) this stuff cleared up my eczema, I mean it's gone and my skin glows.

I had come across compelling reasons online to add this to my daily nutritional supplements so I bought this product and I have to tell you before I opened the jar I was skedish about downing a tablespoon of this stuff so I first added it to my oatmeal and it actually enhanced the flavor.  My next move was to allow it to liquefy and then I downed a tablespoon of it right out of the jar and I was delighted how wonderful it tasted.

Simply put, I LOVE this stuff! I originally purchased it to replace butter in the kitchen. When I broke it open I was taken in by the smell...it was amazing. I was a little concerned because it smelled kinda sweet, so I wasn't certain if it would alter the taste of my savory dishes. It made them taste better than butter ever did! After doing a little more research I found there are SOOOO many other beneficial uses. So, I have taken to using it on my hair and skin. In fact, I had a little eczema episode on my wrist that the coconut oil healed in less than a week and it has not returned. Highly recommended.

I can't say enough about this wonderful product, and the amazing properties that it has... I use it in my oatmeal every morning, spread it on toast, cook with it, and use it on my skin. I began using it in Jan. of this year, after viewing the "Alzheimers" videos on F/B.
I put one tablespoon in my oatmeal everyday, as well as using it as a spread, etc.
My energy level is definitely elevated,and my skin is like silk..
Lots of potitives with this product.

Summary: Solid in the jar but starts melting in your hands!!!
Text:
This is really a fantastic product. Ordered it for my hair. I have fine brunette chemically treated hair. Doing wonders for my hair and my skin.
I love how it looks so solid in the jar but starts melting in your hands. It also does not run down your neck like the olive oil does!
It is a massive jar which can last years and I love the smell!

I am using this for both health benefits (consumption) and for cosmetic purposes (application.) The product arrived on time in perfect condition. It tastes wonderful, feels great on my skin and has a very pleasant aroma. Everything that I ordered arrived very quickly and was packaged altogether because I used the free Super Saving shipping option. Fantastic! Overall, I am pleased with this product as it is the healthiest coconut oil that I could find without paying exorbitant prices. Thanks!
Great item has many uses! I use it in my hair, on my body as a moisturizer, in my food and also as a supplement. It's the best and for a very good price.

I love this coconut oil! I use it on my body, face, and hair. It also smells and tastes delicious. I can eat it plain, but one of my favorite ways to eat it is with some mini chocolate chips sprinkled over a spoonful of it. Yum! I also like to cook french toast in it and top my sweet potatoes with it. My only complaint is that it's a little grainy. I don't notice it so much when I eat it, but I do when I'm using it as a moisturizer. It's not that big of a deal though. And to be fair, this is the only coconut oil I have ever bought so I can't compare it to any other brands. I love it so much, though, that I have no reason to try any other brands.

This is an excellent product. I use it as a body moisturizer, my daughter uses it on her hair and I have also used it for cooking! It has a very delicate fragrance (even my boys thought it smelled nice). The taste is very mild and slightly sweet -- great for cooking. It is very hard but quickly softens in your hand. Amazing product! I am ordering more as a gift for family members who don't like all the chemicals in lotions!
This organic coconut oil was exactly what I hoped it would be.  I use it for my very dry skin and it really does the trick!

Very fresh oil with a creamy coconut flavor that melts on your tongue.  Solid at room temperature, but liquifies quickly.  I use it as a lotion and for my hair, nutritional supplement, occasional eye makeup remover, and sometime drinking chocolate mix-in.  Also used it in my morning smoothie, with frozen pineapples and milk, to make a pina colada-style drink.

I love this coconut oil it is everything I was hoping for and then some! I use it for my hair and face and wow. I have frizzy, dry, curly hair and since I've been using the coconut oil my hair is smooth, straight and dandruff free!! I've had a horrible experience with an acne treatment and burned my eye sockets and the coconut oil has restored them back to normal and even made a few improvement because I see less wrinkles. I wanted to use this for my high cholesterol but have yet to start taking it as a supplement. From tomorrow on I will. =) Great buy, try it!

This stuff is a GREAT moisturizer!!! All natural and coconut oil has a natural sunscreen!! Smells great, absorbs well. I use it on my face and Im not greasy at the end of the day. Great for all over body! Rough elbows, feet, wonderful on hands! Truly a great product!

Summary: Ease into if you're not used to it, pure quality product
Text:
You can taste the coconut. It's slightly sweet. I took about a generous tablespoon in my first ingestion attempt. Mind you, I've previously used other coconut oils before, but I would have to say the were greatly inferior to this product.
I felt ill to the stomach within 30-45 minutes of consuming the tablespoon...I did what every American does, I googled. Turns out that it's common for those who have an overabundance of yeast in the system. I drink tons of beer, well Belgian wheat ale to be exact, and the coconut oil reportedly acts as a detox according to some holistic opinions. I'm willing to give it a further try. I think it's best that you ease into coconut oil therapy vice gobbling a juicy tablespoon of it. I will update this review in a few months, but few on people on Amazon report experiencing any malaise from consuming coconut oil and I had to do a quick search to learn how common it is.
Otherwise, I concur that this is a superior product and if any true benefit would be redeemed from ingesting coconut oil, this would be one of the key ones to try.

It has stopped my scalp from becoming dry and flaky like it used to do, yet it's light enough to not make my hair greasy (I have relaxed hair with the usual "new growth"). This makes my skin feel soft and absorbs pretty easily, especially after the shower. I also love the light coconut scent.

I got this because I read on a forum I frequent that it helps with "chicken skin," which I have unfortunately carried over from my teenage years. "Don't worry about it," my parents would assure me, "that goes away when you get older." No, mom, I don't think so. I'm in my 20s and still have rough skin on the back of my arms and it's not fun. I've tried $50 creams, exfoliating scrubs, etc. from high end brands, and nothing has ever really worked. I've only used this a couple of times and I already feel a huge difference. I just use it right after the shower and it absorbs into my skin wonderfully. I liked it so much after using it the first time, that I used it on my legs, hands, etc. and my skin everywhere is softer than it has ever been. I even tried it on razor burn(I get the WORST razor burn), and it really helped soothe it overnight. I usually buy products for specific uses and this is my first time trying something completely natural on my skin, but I'm so glad I did. Try it, it's so much more worth it than all the more expensive, chemical-filled products out there!

Summary: Very good product, but a 60% price increase in a week?
Text:
I bought a jar of this thing on Aug 16 for seven bucks (and free delivery if over Amazon's minimum for such). It came pretty fast, in a semi-liquid state but not leaking; rather well packaged. I let it melt completely in a warm room (CO melts at about 80 deg F) and then put it in the fridge to let it solidify. One of the reasons I did (and always do) that is to smooth out the texture: as is, every type of CO I've tried comes in like a bunch of white fibers stuck in more even liquid, but if you thaw it completely and then freeze, it becomes all evenly semi-transparent, like one thick candle sort of thing. It probably doesn't matter; just a personal quirk, I guess.

Anyway, this is good stuff: the taste is nice -- very good for sweetich things like carrots or plums, for example (I always have a bowl of very lightly steamed carrots around, and I snack on them, taking one and dipping it into CO, which is good for two reasons: first, it tastes great, and second, carotene is fat-soluble so you need to combine carrots with some sort of fat or it won't be used by the body well).

All in all, there isn't much to say -- CO is CO is CO; this kind is no different from other types I've tried. CO in general is shamelessly hyped as a sort of panacea from every health problem known to man; this is mostly lies, but two things are true: it is tasty, and it's good for skin/hair (I've tried both, and it's true, it works). Don't believe anything else and don't "take" it daily as if it were a medicine: it's pure saturated fat and that's the end of it: it will raise your cholesterol as any other kind of saturated fat. As far as its being a weight-loss agent, this is not a complete lie, but remember, it works only if you _substitute_ CO for other kinds of saturated fats (that means quit eating butter, meat, etc.) If, otoh, you simply _add_ it to your normal diet, you're not gonna lose any weight -- instead, you're gonna gain weight at least as good as you would otherwise + increase your cholesterol. But if you decide to substitute, do not think it's an easy choice: CO is pure saturated fat, whereas other sources of saturated fats (butter, meat, etc.) come with a lot of nutritional goodness like vitamins, proteins, and the like -- things that CO is wholly devoid of. So my suggestion, for what it's worth (not much, I know) is to use CO just as another agreeable food to be used in moderation, not a magic medicine. I read somewhere that a 40-sh male in good health on a 2000 cal/day diet can get 200 calories from saturated fats w/o harming himself.

One other thing I wanted to mention: the jar says it's "pure extra virgin" -- keep in mind that "extra virgin" is meaningful only when applied to olive oil. That is because there are specific and stringent industry standards stipulating what constitutes "virgin", "extra virgin", etc. There are no such standards about any other oils, so saying your CO is "extra virgin" communicates zero useful information and is no more than disingenuous hand-waving. It's like Nutiva says on their jars "no cholesterol!". No kidding, it's like wood-free nails. Of course plant-derived foods have no cholesterol, but BS rules in this industry, so just be aware of what's what and smart enough to dismiss useless hype like claims of a CO being "extra virgin".

OK, there's really no more to say: as long as you use this tasty substance rationally, it's good stuff, so bottomline is: recommended -- except for one thing: just as I was deciding it's time to post a review and navigating to this page, I noticed that the price went up by the mind-blowing 60 percent since, not just since I bought it (two weeks ago), but literally within the last few days. Does my salary go up 60 percent in a couple of days? No. So, while the product is good and I can't give it less than five stars, I will suggest you do not reward naked greed and at least try to find better-priced alternatives. Especially in this economic environment that we have right now. The current price here is even higher than it is in Wegman's (brick-and-mortar grocery store; they carry it, but it's more than the seven bucks I bought it for here).

PS. Btw, I see now someone reports that this oil comes in a glass jar: this is a bare-faced lie. The jar is transparent plastic, quite soft actually, so you can't _honestly_ mistake it for glass. Be extremely suspicious about these massive five-star reviews (here and elsewhere); I for a long time have a feeling those are posted by manufacturers' employees to create hype (and why not? Amazon does nothing to guard against fake reviews; all one needs to do in order to start posting reviews (real OR fake) is buy something once from this site). Some reviews read like the reviewer hasn't actually seen the product in question and is interested only in adding another five-star rating, not the review.

PPS. Thanks to commenters Lulu and Adriana for additional info and helpful suggestions.

Summary: A health Miracle in a Jar
Text:
I love this stuff. It is delicious. It is solid at room temperature but I prefer it in liquid form which I achieve by running the jar under hot water. My hubby had no problem w this and even joked it was so good that he could drink it with a straw. I have suffered w a systemic yeast infection for years which has caused numerous skin problems and a nasty white tongue. This has cleared that up in a week. The pimples I had on my arms and thighs are gone and so are my undereye dark circles. My nails are growing smoothly and my hair stopped falling out when I brush. I also started using it as a vaginal moisturizer and I am extremely pleased with the results. I also noticed how it helped with my cold. My symptoms were mild whereas everyone else had a more severe reaction. It also helped with my cracking feet and my pinky toe, which has been blackened forever, is returning to normal. I love using it on the kids lips because I know when they lick it off it's not harmful. My hubby started taking it as well when he saw how I benefited and he loves the natural burst of energy he gets after. My daughter finally tried some and now loves it on her madelines in the morning. This is healthy for you, gives you energy, aids in weight loss and kills bacterias, yeasts and fungus. I also make a lip scrub w a drop of coconut oil in the palm of my kids' hands and a pinch of sugar. They love how yummy it is, I don't worry if they get it in their mouths, and they no longer have dry, cracking winter lips. My youngest has been using it nightly, after her bath, and the excema that plagues her legs, hasn't returned w the dry, cold air. This has become one of the most used products in my home.

Recently, I wanted to "up the ante" on my Omega fatty acids so I added Coconut oil to go along with my doses of flaxseed oil and fish oil. Yes, Coconut Oil is a saturated fat, but because it's a medium chain tryclyceride (MCT), it's more easily absorbed by the body and converted into energy, not stored on the body as fat. This product has a nice flavor--I use it in cooking and it doesn't depart any heavy "coconut" flavor. Sometimes I just eat a tablespoon. The benefits are tremendous: microbial properties, helps thyroid, liver, pancreas, bones, skin, soothes the digestive tract. The list goes on.

I bought one jar for the kitchen and one jar for my bathroom. This product is great to put on right after a bath or shower. Yes it's a bit greasy at first, but rub it in well and let it absorb, then wipe off the excess with a damp towel or wash cloth. Your skin will be satiny smooth.

Bonus tip: I give a teaspoon to my dog every day. Studies show dogs' prefrontal brains benefit from this wonder fat.

Summary: Super quality - will never order any other brand
Text:

I found that if you keep it at temps above 76 degrees it stays pretty clear - but if you live in a cooler climate (or have air conditioning) it can solidify. I find that I can only consume it when it's in a liquid state - I seem to gag if it's even slightly solid. Just a few seconds in the microwave can fix that. I highly recommend this brand - it tastes great and works!

I don't generally review products, but this works so well for me that I wanted to write about it in hopes someone with the same problem will read this and give coconut oil a try.

For years I've been trying to find some sort of moisturizing lotion, ointment, or oil that would relieve my extremely dry skin. Lotions required constant reapplication, so they were expensive and inconvenient. Ointments were too thick and would make my skin hot and sometimes exacerbate itching. Baby oil didn't seem thick enough. The best solution I found was dissolving a bit of ointment in sesame oil with a dab of steroid ointment to control itching. It was okay, but not great. Plus, I quickly tired of smelling like popcorn.

My dermatologist recommended that I try coconut oil. I've been astonished by how well it works. After only two days of use, my eczema rashes had faded considerably because they longer itched. Patches that I had for months were suddenly gone. The rest of my skin no longer feels dry and tight, which means no new rashes! I only have to apply coconut oil in the morning and after my shower with no need to reapply throughout the day. Best of all, I smell (quite literally) like a fresh coconut right after I apply it, and the scent fades rather quickly (so I don't get sick of it).

I realize this sounds too good to be true, and I'll be sure to update if the product suddenly stops working. But for the time being, I'm absolutely thrilled with the improvement I've seen in my skin!

Summary: must try item, highly recommend to my family and friends

Summary: The many uses of coconut oil...
Text: I purchased this item about a month ago. I wanted to wait until I had an opportunity to really use the product in many ways and to gauge the results.  I started out taking tablespoon as soon as I purchased it...and soon discovered that other reviewers are correct - some people have to work their way up to taking a tablespoon. Now I take a table spoon in the morning mixed with a protein shake. Sometimes, I mix it in hot coffee or tea. I have also started taking an additional tablespoon in the afternoon either spread on crackers or a small piece of bread.  As a food, it gives me an extra boost of energy and seems to make me more alert.  I have begun to lose weight but I am not certain if this is because of the coconut oil or because I have implemented a walking routine. Either way, it gave me the energy to want to get up and get moving! I also use it as a moisturizer on my skin. It does go on rather oily, but it absorbs quickly. I just have to make certain that I give myself enough time for the oil to absorb before putting on certain fabrics. I was in awe regarding how soft my skin felt. Rough patches are now smooth.  I have stopped using a popular African American hair moisturizer on my son's hair and began using this.  All I can say is his hair loves coconut oil. It improved his texture.  I have also used it on an area of his head that seemed prone to razor bumps.  It is healing well. Finally, I read that this is safe for dogs.  I gave some to my dog and now he demands it each morning. He loves it too.
This stuff is awesom!! I use it on my hair and as a body moisterizer ,leaves my skin soft and my hair shiny .  i will be ordering some more very soon :)

Interestingly enough, it arrived in liquid form (it's hot here) and I slathered it on my elbows right away. It worked great! Softened and smoothed them and got rid of that leathery feel. Can't wait to use it as a full-body moisturizer after a shower (just not on the face--never put coconut oil on the face if you don't like clogged pores).

Text: When buying coconut oil, I often research every option possible and compare the price per ounce.  I make and sell granola and need to get the best price possible without sacrificing quality. Summary: Better than I thought it would be
Text: I was skeptical of the difference in all natural organic and the stuff you get from a regular grocery store.  I bought other coconut oil mostly due to the fact that it was the same price as olive oil and I thought it was "all natural" as it basically stated it on the container.  After reading reviews of the other stuff I bought not being organic I decided to give this a try.  While this is definitely pricier, the difference is astounding!  If you like the taste of coconuts, this is the bomb.  The other tasted nothing like coconuts, or really anything at all, so when I opened the container of this I was quite intrigued.  I put this on vegetables and when I cook fish and it definitely helps with the vegetables since I have to generally force myself to eat them.  With that said, I don't think I would buy this product again simply due to price.  I would go to another brand assuming they are as good since you can buy much more for only a little bit more in cost.  This changed my whole view toward organic, and hopefully makes me healthier.  If you read this review look at all the stuff they put in processed food ... specifically benzene!  I work in chemical plants, so I know how terrible this stuff is, and the fact they use it in food processing blows my mind!  Also, the fact that they don't have to tell you is even crazier.  There is no way this type of stuff doesn't harm you!
Not much to say but, this is good stuff,EFAGold Coconut Oil, Extra Virgin, Organic, 16 oz. for a good price.

Summary: Alive, Ageless, Gourmet and Gathering Years... meaning the oil!]
Text:
Length:: 9:15 Mins

Some say the COCONUT palm is the Tree of Life. They say Life is honored and perpetuated through its meat, its water, its oil, its presence.

In my opinion, EVAGold, and the Nutiva brand of coconut oil shown in the video, are among the highest qualities available, of life healing offerings from this sacred gift of a tree. I had sensed this cold pressed oil's uncanny value as soon as I saw a picture of a jar of EVAGold on Swanson's product list on Amazon. I had come to trust Swanson [as much as I continue to trust Amazon] from purchases of several types of magnesium supplements including Magnesium Oil 8 fl oz Spray.

Reading Bruce Fife's The COCONUT OIL MIRACLE, provided necessary information for working with this fruit. Reading that book also clarified my previous belief in the healing nutrition in coconut oil, and in these brands' production purity [other excellent brands are also available; these two are just the ones I've used successfully so far]. My experience of using this type of cold pressed, virgin coconut oil for only 24 hours had shown results which made me feel blessed!

I've been slowly and steadily rectifying a serious magnesium deficiency while searching for what felt like a missing catalyst or synergistic essence which would cause magnesium supplementation to be accepted by the body, and then seated into the cellular level of life enhancing operations. Dr. Carolyn Dean's book, The MAGNESIUM MIRACLE is an excellent guide to Magnesium's magic in healing, normalizing, and strengthening the embodied human soul. I've been thinking that coconut, in its several forms of use, could work as a catalyst for magnesium, while magnesium works as a catalyst for all other nutrients, including coconut oil, to function correctly. What a team!!

To understand the vital message in what I'm trying to say here, please be cajoled or even coerced (jokingly) into reading some of my Amazon.com reviews on magnesium products and the two books linked above... as a start on a journey to understanding, appreciating, and relishing LIFE. Other great Magnesium and Coconut books and products are available, easily found using search capacities.

According to some experts, the most important thing to know about oils, fats, and coconut products is that they should be gently, minimally, and carefully processed by cold pressing, preferably labeled ANH (absolutely no heat used in processing); the reasons for this are detailed in Fife's book.

Also according to some experts, the most important thing to know about magnesium is that it needs to be held in highest priority and percentage in the minerals taken into the body, and that certain foods, additives, and supplements can defeat bio-availability of magnesium. Especially calcium needs to be taken in much lower amounts than magnesium, and in the current food marketplace and general eating habits; calcium is usually assimilated in large quantities, causing illnesses related to calcification or deposits, and contributing to magnesium deficiency. This situation is detailed in Dr. Dean's book.

My main concern with coconut usage for persons like me who are severely deficient in magnesium is that most offerings of coconut I'm aware of hold more potassium than magnesium, which could upset the balance and primary necessity of magnesium.

In my non-professional opinion magnesium is the INDEX nutritional substance; the A-Priori for Life.

Maybe even the Tree of Life needs magnesium as its priority nutrient...

With adequate magnesium held within the cell structures... [some experts say cells need to retain 10,000 times more magnesium than any other mineral]... the body can adequately and correctly utilize other minerals and necessary nutrients, in order to live strong and disease free. [See my review of Dr. Dean's book.]

Maybe magnesium seats life, coconut is the cozy catalyst, and taste buds rule!

Linda Shelnutt

Other excellent coconut oils available on Amazon:

Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 54-Ounce Jar
[The link above goes to the large size, the one I showed in my review on Bruce Fife's book]

Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 15-Ounce Tubs (Pack of 2) [This is the product used in the video here. Though the flavor and quality of the EFAGold was slightly better, of the bottles I've used so far, I will happily and thankfully continue to purchase all three of these products, for various reasons favoring each.]

Really was surprised about the taste!Not what I was expecting.There may be others even better,and I will try them all.But as usual.....any thing that's good for you is expensive,That's why poor people will never be healthy.

Summary: I don't eat it, but I love it for my skin and hair!
Text:
People usually use coconut oil for food consumption, but I don't because I eat low-fat and get what I need by consuming small amounts of whole nuts, seeds or avocado. Oil is not a whole food and is pure saturated fat. You may want to debate me on this, but I am not open to change my view (I have studied up on this and know I feel much better and have more energy without loading up on lots of fat and protein).

I prefer to use this oil for my hair and as a moisturizer for my body. It has a great smell (I think about the coconut butter people use when they go to the beach) and it is certified organic. It make my hair and skin feel soft and silky and lasts a long time, as I have the same container for almost a year.
This is exactly what I was looking for and it is exactly what was described in the listing info so I am very pleased and would recommend this product to others.

Summary: Wish I had Found This a Long Time Ago!

Coconut oil absorbs very well into my hair without leaving it greasy (a little goes a long way). Make sure to put it on last as a sealant for any other moisturizers that you use. I feel a lot better knowing that something I am putting onto my skin and absorbing into my bloodstream does not contain a mass of impossible to pronounce ingredients. My only advice is that you find some kind of bottle to put it in or mix it into your favorite lotion. I rinsed out an empty shampoo bottle. I haven't tried it in my hair yet but plan too. I'm ordering the 54oz tub from a different brand from amazon today.
